69  extern bool fill_trick_and_key_combo_arrays( Script::CArray* p_key_combos, Script::CArray* p_key_combo_strings, Script::CArray* p_trick_names, int premade_cat_index );

107 CGoalManager::CGoalManager()
108 {
109  m_lastGoal = 0;
110  m_graffitiMode = 0;
111  m_goalPoints = 0;
112  m_totalGoalPointsEarned = 0;
113  m_cash = 0;
114  m_numGoalsBeaten = 0;
115  m_isPro = false;
116  // m_proChallengesUnlocked = false;
117  m_canStartGoal = true;
118 
119  m_currentChapter = 0;
120  m_currentStage = 0;
121  m_sponsor = 0;
122  mp_team = new Script::CStruct();
123 
124  mp_goalFlags = new Script::CStruct();
125  // mp_proSpecificChallenges = new Script::CStruct();
126  // mp_proSpecificChallenges->AppendStructure( Script::GetStructure( "goal_pro_specific_challenges_beaten", Script::ASSERT ) );
127 
128  mp_difficulty_levels = new Script::CStruct();
129 }
130 
131 /******************************************************************/
132 /* */
133 /* */
134 /******************************************************************/
135 
136 CGoalManager::~CGoalManager()
137 {
138  // delete all the goals in the list
139  RemoveAllGoals();
140  delete mp_goalFlags;
141  // delete mp_proSpecificChallenges;
142 }
143 
144 /******************************************************************/
145 /* */
146 /* */
147 /******************************************************************/
148 
149 bool CGoalManager::AddGoal( uint32 goalId, Script::CStruct* pParams )
150 {
151  // don't add non-minigames in free skate
152  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
153  bool free_skate = skate_mod->GetGameMode()->IsTrue( CRCD(0x337e7779,"is_freeskate") );
154  if ( !CFuncs::ScriptInMultiplayerGame( NULL, NULL ) && free_skate && !pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x6bae094c,"minigame") ) )
155  return false;
156 
157  if ( skate_mod->GetGameMode()->IsTrue( CRCD( 0x353961d7, "is_creategoals" ) ) && !pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD( 0x981d3ad0, "edited_goal" ) ) )
158  return false;
159 
160  // printf("addGoal called with goalId %x\n", goalId);
161 
162  Dbg_MsgAssert( !m_goalList.GetItem( goalId ), ( "duplicate goal id 0x%x (%s), please check your script", goalId, Script::FindChecksumName( goalId ) ) );
163  pParams->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x9982e501,"goal_id"), goalId );
164 
165  // figure the type
166  CGoal* pGoal = NULL;
167  if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xc18fef36,"career_only") ) )
168  {
169  if( CFuncs::ScriptInMultiplayerGame( NULL, NULL ))
170  {
171  return false;
172  }
173  }
174  if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x4af5d34e,"competition") ) )
175  {
176  // printf("adding comp goal\n");
177  pGoal = new CCompetitionGoal( pParams );
178  }
179  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xd15ea00,"net") ) )
180  {
181  // printf("adding net goal\n");
182  pGoal = new CNetGoal( pParams );
183  }
184  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x25904450,"race") ) )
185  {
186  // printf("adding race goal\n");
187  pGoal = new CRaceGoal( pParams );
188  }
189  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x6bae094c,"minigame") ) )
190  {
191  // printf("adding minigame\n");
192  pGoal = new CMinigame( pParams );
193  }
194  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x8cfee956,"betting_guy") ) )
195  {
196  // printf("adding betting guy\n");
197  pGoal = new CBettingGuy( pParams );
198  }
199  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x4147922b,"tetris") ) )
200  {
201  // printf("adding skatetris goal\n");
202  pGoal = new CSkatetrisGoal( pParams );
203  }
204  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x9d65d0e7,"horse") ) )
205  {
206  // printf("adding horse goal\n");
207  pGoal = new CHorseGoal( pParams );
208  }
209  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD( 0xc5ec08e6, "findGaps" ) ) )
210  {
211  pGoal = new CFindGapsGoal( pParams );
212  }
213  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD( 0x7dbb41dd, "Film" ) ) )
214  {
215  pGoal = new CFilmGoal( pParams );
216  }
217  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD( 0x8e6014f6, "create_a_trick" ) ) )
218  {
219  pGoal = new CCatGoal( pParams );
220  }
221  else
222  {
223  pGoal = new CGoal( pParams );
224  }
225  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
226 
227  m_goalList.PutItem( goalId, pGoal );
228 
229  pGoal->AppendDifficultyLevelParams();
230  Script::CStruct* pGoalParams = pGoal->GetParams();
231 
232  // add children
233  uint32 childId;
234  Script::CArray* p_children;
235  if ( pGoalParams->GetArray( CRCD( 0x5e684e45, "children" ), &p_children, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
236  {
237  int size = p_children->GetSize();
238  Dbg_MsgAssert( size > 0, ( "0 size children array for goal %s", Script::FindChecksumName( goalId ) ) );
239  Dbg_MsgAssert( p_children->GetType() == ESYMBOLTYPE_NAME, ( "children array has wrong type for goal %s", Script::FindChecksumName( goalId ) ) );
240  for ( int i = 0; i < size; i++ )
241  {
242  FindCircularLinks( goalId, p_children->GetChecksum( i ) );
243  pGoal->AddChild( p_children->GetChecksum( i ) );
244  }
245  }
246  else if ( pGoalParams->GetChecksum( CRCD( 0xdd4cabd6, "child" ), &childId, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
247  {
248  FindCircularLinks( goalId, childId );
249  pGoal->AddChild( childId );
250  }
251 
252  if ( CFuncs::ScriptInMultiplayerGame( NULL, NULL ))
253  {
254  // SKATE SPECIFIC
255  pGoal->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0x944b2900,"pro"), "NetJudge" );
256  pGoal->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0x243b9c3b,"full_name"), Script::GetString( CRCD(0xa500bc5f,"judge_full_name") ) );
257  // END SKATE SPECIFIC
258  }
259  else
260  {
261  // SKATE SPECIFIC
262  const char* pFirstName;
263  uint32 pro_name;
264  if ( pGoal->GetParams()->GetString( CRCD(0x944b2900,"pro"), &pFirstName, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
265  {
266  // printf("pro string: %s\n", pFirstName );
267  Script::CStruct* pLastNames = Script::GetStructure( CRCD(0x621d1828,"goal_pro_last_name_checksums") );
268  if ( pLastNames->GetChecksum( Script::GenerateCRC( pFirstName ), &pro_name, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
269  {
270  // printf("got a last name: %s\n", Script::FindChecksumName( pro_name ) );
271  // get the current skater's name
272  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
273  Obj::CPlayerProfileManager* pPlayerProfileManager = skate_mod->GetPlayerProfileManager();
274  Obj::CSkaterProfile* pSkaterProfile = pPlayerProfileManager->GetCurrentProfile();
275  uint32 current_skater = pSkaterProfile->GetSkaterNameChecksum();
276  // printf("current_skater: %s\n", Script::FindChecksumName( current_skater ) );
277  if ( current_skater == pro_name )
278  {
279  const char* p_generic_pro_first_name = Script::GetString( CRCD(0x2245b93c,"generic_pro_first_name"), Script::ASSERT );
280  pGoal->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0x944b2900,"pro"), p_generic_pro_first_name );
281  const char* p_generic_pro_full_name = Script::GetString( CRCD(0xfe6ef7b8,"generic_pro_full_name"), Script::ASSERT );
282  pGoal->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0x243b9c3b,"full_name"), p_generic_pro_full_name );
283  }
284  }
285  }
286  // END SKATE SPECIFIC
287  }
288 
289  return ( pGoal != NULL );
290 }
291 
292 /******************************************************************/
293 /* */
294 /* */
295 /******************************************************************/
296 
297 CGoal* CGoalManager::GetGoal( uint32 goalId, bool assert )
298 {
299  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItem( goalId );
300  if ( assert )
301  Dbg_MsgAssert( pGoal, ( "Could not find goal %s\n", Script::FindChecksumName( goalId ) ) );
302 
303  return pGoal;
304 }
305 
306 /******************************************************************/
307 /* */
308 /* */
309 /******************************************************************/
310 
311 CGoal* CGoalManager::GetGoal( Script::CStruct* pParams, bool assert )
312 {
313  uint32 goalId = GetGoalIdFromParams( pParams, assert );
314  if ( goalId )
315  return GetGoal( goalId, assert );
316  return NULL;
317 }
318 
319 
320 /******************************************************************/
321 /* */
322 /* */
323 /******************************************************************/
324 
325 CGoal* CGoalManager::GetGoalByIndex( int index )
326 {
327  return m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( index, NULL );
328 }
329 
330 /******************************************************************/
331 /* */
332 /* */
333 /******************************************************************/
334 
335 bool CGoalManager::RemoveGoal( uint32 goalId )
336 {
337  // TODO: Maybe add an "AssertOnFail" flag
338 
339  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItem( goalId );
340  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
341 
342  pGoal->mp_goalPed->DestroyGoalPed();
343  m_goalList.FlushItem( goalId );
344 
345  if (m_lastGoal == goalId)
346  {
347  m_lastGoal=0;
348  }
349 
350  // The FlushItem does not delete the CGoal* itself, it only deletes its own entry for
351  // it (which is a LookupItem<CGoal>*) so we need to delete the pGoal here.
352  delete pGoal;
353 
354  return true;
355 }
356 
357 /******************************************************************/
358 /* */
359 /* */
360 /******************************************************************/
361 
362 bool CGoalManager::ActivateGoal( uint32 goalId, bool dontAssert )
363 {
364  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
365 
366  bool success = false;
367 
368  if ( !pGoal )
369  {
370  if ( dontAssert )
371  return false;
372  else
373  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "ActivateGoal could not find the goal" ) );
374  }
375 
376  if ( pGoal )
377  {
378  success = pGoal->Activate();
379  // set the last goal
380  if ( success && pGoal->CanRetry() )
381  {
382  // only set this for the root node
383  // BB - changed! the retry goal option now
384  // always gives you the last stage.
385 
386  // Game::CGoalLink* p_parents = pGoal->GetParents();
387  // if ( p_parents->m_relative == 0 )
388  m_lastGoal = goalId;
389  }
390  }
391 
392  // move it back and forth from the inactive to the active list
393  // TODO: Maybe add an "AssertOnFail" flag
394  return success;
395 }
396 
397 /******************************************************************/
398 /* */
399 /* */
400 /******************************************************************/
401 
402 bool CGoalManager::DeactivateGoal( uint32 goalId )
403 {
404  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
405  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
406 
407  if ( pGoal )
408  {
409  pGoal->Deactivate();
410  }
411 
412  // move it back and forth from the inactive to the active list
413  // would be an optimization?
414 
415  // TODO: Maybe add an "AssertOnFail" flag
416 
417  return ( pGoal != NULL );
418 }
419 
420 /******************************************************************/
421 /* */
422 /* */
423 /******************************************************************/
424 
425 void CGoalManager::ClearLastGoal( void )
426 {
427  m_lastGoal = 0;
428 }
429 
430 /******************************************************************/
431 /* */
432 /* */
433 /******************************************************************/
434 
435 bool CGoalManager::WinGoal( uint32 goalId )
436 {
437  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
438  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
439  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
440 
441  if ( pGoal )
442  {
443  // don't let them retry this goal
444  // only if it's a leaf node
445  if ( pGoal->GetChildren()->m_relative == 0 )
446  m_lastGoal = 0;
447 
448  // we always want to call win, but if they
449  // already beat it, we don't want to give them
450  // double credit
451  if ( !pGoal->HasWonGoal() )
452  {
453  // Report winning leaf node goals
454  if( ( pGoal->GetChildren()->m_relative == 0 ) &&
455  ( gamenet_man->InNetGame()))
456  {
457  Net::Client* client;
458  Net::MsgDesc msg_desc;
459 
460  Dbg_Printf( "*** Reporting won goal\n" );
461  // TODO: This should use the appropriate client for the skater completing this trick.
462  // Assuming client Zero will probably cause problems in split-screen games
463  client = gamenet_man->GetClient( 0 );
464  Dbg_Assert( client );
465 
466  GameNet::MsgBeatGoal msg;
467 
468  msg.m_GameId = gamenet_man->GetNetworkGameId();
469  msg.m_GoalId = pGoal->GetRootGoalId();
470 
471  Dbg_Printf( "**** Beat GOAL 0x%x ROOT: 0x%x\n", pGoal->GetGoalId(), pGoal->GetRootGoalId());
472 
473  msg_desc.m_Data = &msg;
474  msg_desc.m_Length = sizeof( GameNet::MsgBeatGoal );
475  msg_desc.m_Id = GameNet::MSG_ID_BEAT_GOAL;
476  msg_desc.m_Queue = Net::QUEUE_SEQUENCED;
477  msg_desc.m_GroupId = GameNet::vSEQ_GROUP_PLAYER_MSGS;
478  client->EnqueueMessageToServer( &msg_desc );
479  }
480  else
481  {
482  // increase num goals beaten if this is a leaf node.
483  if ( pGoal->GetChildren()->m_relative == 0 )
484  if ( !pGoal->GetParams()->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x981d3ad0,"edited_goal") ) )
485  m_numGoalsBeaten++;
486  }
487 
488  }
489 
490  // In net games, "won" goals need to be approved by the server
491  // Update: Win goals locally now to close the window where time can expire waiting for server's approval
492  pGoal->Win();
493  }
494 
495  /*
496  if( gamenet_man->InNetGame() == false )
497  {
498  if ( !m_isPro && ( m_numGoalsBeaten >= m_numGoalsToPro ) )
499  {
500  TurnPro();
501  }
502  }
503  */
504 
505  return ( pGoal != NULL );
506 }
507 
508 /******************************************************************/
509 /* */
510 /* */
511 /******************************************************************/
512 
513 bool CGoalManager::LoseGoal( uint32 goalId )
514 {
515  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
516  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
517 
518  // expire takes priority over fail
519  if ( pGoal )
520  {
521  pGoal->Lose();
522  }
523 
524  return ( pGoal != NULL );
525 }
526 
527 /******************************************************************/
528 /* */
529 /* */
530 /******************************************************************/
531 
532 bool CGoalManager::EditGoal( uint32 goalId, Script::CStruct* pParams )
533 {
534  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
535 
536  if ( pGoal )
537  {
538  pGoal->EditParams( pParams );
539  }
540 
541  // should edit the state of the goal here...
542 
543  // TODO: Maybe add an "AssertOnFail" flag
544 
545  return ( pGoal != NULL );
546 }
547 
548 /******************************************************************/
549 /* */
550 /* */
551 /******************************************************************/
552 
553 bool CGoalManager::SetGoalTimer( uint32 goalId, int time )
554 {
555  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
556  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
557 
558  if ( pGoal )
559  {
560  if (time == -1)
561  {
562  pGoal->SetTimer();
563  }
564  else
565  {
566  pGoal->SetTimer(time);
567  }
568  }
569 
570  // should edit the state of the goal here...
571 
572  // TODO: Maybe add an "AssertOnFail" flag
573 
574  return ( pGoal != NULL );
575 }
576 
577 /******************************************************************/
578 /* */
579 /* */
580 /******************************************************************/
581 
582 bool CGoalManager::GoalIsActive( uint32 goalId )
583 {
584  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId, false );
585 
586  if ( pGoal )
587  {
588  return pGoal->IsActive();
589  }
590 
591  return false;
592 }
593 
594 /******************************************************************/
595 /* */
596 /* */
597 /******************************************************************/
598 
599 int CGoalManager::GetActiveGoal( bool ignore_net_goals )
600 {
601  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
602  {
603  uint32 key;
604  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
605  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
606 
607  if( ignore_net_goals && pGoal->IsNetGoal())
608  {
609  continue;
610  }
611  if ( pGoal->IsActive() )
612  {
613  return i;
614  }
615  }
616  return -1;
617 }
618 
619 
620 /******************************************************************/
621 /* */
622 /* */
623 /******************************************************************/
624 
625 int CGoalManager::GetNumGoals()
626 {
627  return m_goalList.getSize();
628 }
629 
630 /******************************************************************/
631 /* */
632 /* */
633 /******************************************************************/
634 
635 int CGoalManager::GetNumActiveGoals( bool count_all )
636 {
637  int numActiveGoals = 0;
638 
639  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
640  {
641  uint32 key;
642  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
643  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
644 
645  if( pGoal->IsNetGoal() && !count_all )
646  {
647  continue;
648  }
649  if ( count_all && pGoal->IsActive() )
650  numActiveGoals++;
651  else if ( pGoal->CountAsActive() )
652  numActiveGoals++;
653  }
654  return numActiveGoals;
655 }
656 
657 /******************************************************************/
658 /* */
659 /* */
660 /******************************************************************/
661 
662 int CGoalManager::GetNumSelectedGoals()
663 {
664  int num_selected = 0;
665 
666  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
667  {
668  uint32 key;
669  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
670  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
671 
672  // this is now primarily used for determining if the timer should be on-screen
673  if ( pGoal->IsSelected() )
674  {
675  num_selected++;
676  }
677  }
678  return num_selected;
679 }
680 
681 /******************************************************************/
682 /* */
683 /* */
684 /******************************************************************/
685 
686 void CGoalManager::RemoveAllGoals()
687 {
688  // can't retry!
689  m_lastGoal = 0;
690 
691  // kill the ped
692  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
693  {
694  uint32 key;
695  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
696  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
697 
698  pGoal->mp_goalPed->DestroyGoalPed();
699  }
700 
701  // delete all the goals in the list
702  Lst::LookupTableDestroyer<CGoal> destroyer( &m_goalList );
703  destroyer.DeleteTableContents();
704 }
705 
706 /******************************************************************/
707 /* */
708 /* */
709 /******************************************************************/
710 
711 void CGoalManager::DeactivateAllGoals( bool include_net_goals )
712 {
713  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
714  {
715  uint32 key;
716  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
717  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
718  if ( pGoal->IsActive() )
719  {
720  pGoal->Deactivate( include_net_goals );
721  }
722  }
723 }
724 
725 /******************************************************************/
726 /* */
727 /* */
728 /******************************************************************/
729 
730 void CGoalManager::UninitializeGoal( uint32 goalId )
731 {
732  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
733  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
734  pGoal->Uninit();
735 }
736 
737 /******************************************************************/
738 /* */
739 /* */
740 /******************************************************************/
741 
742 void CGoalManager::UninitializeGoalTree( uint32 goalId )
743 {
744  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
745  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
746  CGoalLink* pGoalLink = pGoal->GetParents();
747  while ( pGoalLink && pGoalLink->m_relative != 0 )
748  {
749  pGoal = GetGoal( pGoalLink->m_relative );
750  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
751  pGoalLink = pGoal->GetParents();
752  }
753 
754  // the resulting goal should be the root node of the family tree
755  pGoal->Uninit( true );
756 }
757 
758 
759 /******************************************************************/
760 /* */
761 /* */
762 /******************************************************************/
763 
764 void CGoalManager::UninitializeAllGoals()
765 {
766  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
767  {
768  uint32 key;
769  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
770  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
771  pGoal->Uninit();
772  }
773 }
774 
775 /******************************************************************/
776 /* */
777 /* */
778 /******************************************************************/
779 
780 void CGoalManager::DeactivateAllMinigames()
781 {
782  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
783  {
784  uint32 key;
785  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
786  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
787  if ( pGoal->IsMinigame() && pGoal->IsActive() )
788  pGoal->Deactivate();
789  }
790 }
791 
792 /******************************************************************/
793 /* */
794 /* */
795 /******************************************************************/
796 
797 void CGoalManager::InitializeAllMinigames()
798 {
799  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
800  {
801  uint32 key;
802  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
803  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
804  if( pGoal->IsMinigame())
805  {
806  pGoal->RunCallbackScript( vINIT );
807  }
808  }
809 }
810 
811 /******************************************************************/
812 /* */
813 /* */
814 /******************************************************************/
815 
816 void CGoalManager::InitializeAllGoals()
817 {
818  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
819 
820  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
821  {
822  uint32 key;
823  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
824  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
825 
826  if( gamenet_man->InNetGame() && !pGoal->IsNetGoal())
827  {
828  continue;
829  }
830 
831  if ( !pGoal->IsLocked() && !pGoal->HasWonGoal() )
832  {
833  // check if this is a child of another goal
834  CGoalLink* pGoalParents = pGoal->GetParents();
835 
836  // support an always_initialize_goal flag, which
837  // allows designers to have goals that aren't tied to
838  // a chapter/stage
839  Script::CStruct* pGoalParams = pGoal->GetParams();
840 
841  int goal_chapter = pGoal->GetChapter();
842  int goal_stage = pGoal->GetStage();
843 
844  // printf("%s: %i.%i\n", Script::FindChecksumName( pGoal->GetGoalId() ), goal_chapter, goal_stage );
845  if ( pGoalParents->m_relative == 0 )
846  {
847  // if the goal isn't listed in chapter_info.q at all,
848  // the chapter and stage will default to -1.
849  // Always create these goals
850  if ( ( goal_chapter == m_currentChapter && goal_stage == m_currentStage )
851  || pGoalParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD( 0x4e863e93, "always_initialize_goal" ) )
852  || pGoalParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD( 0x981d3ad0, "edited_goal" ) ) )
853  {
854  pGoal->Init();
855  }
856  }
857  }
858  }
859 }
860 
861 /******************************************************************/
862 /* */
863 /* */
864 /******************************************************************/
865 
866 void CGoalManager::InitializeAllSelectedGoals()
867 {
868  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
869  {
870  uint32 key;
871  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
872  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
873 
874  if ( pGoal->IsSelected())
875  {
876  Script::RunScript( Script::GenerateCRC( "goal_create_proset_geom" ), pGoal->GetParams());
877  pGoal->Init();
878  }
879  }
880 }
881 
882 /******************************************************************/
883 /* */
884 /* */
885 /******************************************************************/
886 
887 void CGoalManager::DeselectAllGoals()
888 {
889  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
890  {
891  uint32 key;
892  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
893  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
894 
895  pGoal->Deselect();
896  }
897 }
898 
899 /******************************************************************/
900 /* */
901 /* */
902 /******************************************************************/
903 
904 // TODO: make this smarter...it just deactivates the first
905 // non-minigame goal it finds
906 void CGoalManager::DeactivateCurrentGoal()
907 {
908  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
909  {
910  uint32 key;
911  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
912  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
913  if ( pGoal->IsActive() && !pGoal->IsNetGoal() && !pGoal->IsMinigame() )
914  {
915  pGoal->Deactivate();
916  return;
917  }
918  }
919 }
920 
921 /******************************************************************/
922 /* */
923 /* */
924 /******************************************************************/
925 
926 void CGoalManager::Update()
927 {
928  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
929  {
930  uint32 key;
931  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
932  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
933 
934  if ( pGoal->IsActive() )
935  {
936  pGoal->Update();
937  }
938  }
939 
940  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
941  {
942  uint32 key;
943  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
944  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
945 
946  if ( pGoal->IsInvalid() )
947  {
948  //Dbg_Printf("************** removing goal %p\n", pGoal->GetGoalId());
949  m_goalList.FlushItem( pGoal->GetGoalId() );
950  delete pGoal;
951  }
952 /* else
953  {
954  pGoal->Update();
955  }
956 */
957  }
958 }
959 
960 
961 /******************************************************************/
962 /* */
963 /* */
964 /******************************************************************/
965 
966 bool CGoalManager::HasSeenGoal( uint32 goalId )
967 {
968  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
969 
970  if ( pGoal )
971  {
972  return pGoal->HasSeenGoal();
973  }
974 
975  return false;
976 
977 }
978 
979 /******************************************************************/
980 /* */
981 /* */
982 /******************************************************************/
983 
984 void CGoalManager::PauseAllGoals()
985 {
986  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
987  {
988  uint32 key;
989  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
990  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
991 
992  pGoal->PauseGoal();
993  }
994 }
995 
996 /******************************************************************/
997 /* */
998 /* */
999 /******************************************************************/
1000 
1001 void CGoalManager::UnPauseAllGoals()
1002 {
1003  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
1004  {
1005  uint32 key;
1006  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1007  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1008 
1009  pGoal->UnPauseGoal();
1010  }
1011 }
1012 
1013 
1014 /******************************************************************/
1015 /* */
1016 /* */
1017 /******************************************************************/
1018 
1019 Tmr::Time CGoalManager::GetGoalTime()
1020 {
1021  // TODO: allow some sort of goal priority
1022  // right now this just finds the fist active goal
1023  // and returns that timer
1024  for (int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++) {
1025  uint32 key;
1026  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1027  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1028 
1029  if ( pGoal->IsActive() && pGoal->ShouldUseTimer() && !pGoal->IsExpired() )
1030  {
1031  Tmr::Time timeLeft = pGoal->GetTime();
1032  if ( (int)timeLeft < 0 )
1033  return 0;
1034  return timeLeft;
1035  }
1036  }
1037  // there are no active goals.
1038  return 0;
1039 }
1040 
1041 
1042 /******************************************************************/
1043 /* */
1044 /* */
1045 /******************************************************************/
1046 
1047 bool CGoalManager::CanRetryGoal()
1048 {
1049  if ( m_lastGoal != 0 )
1050  {
1051  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( m_lastGoal );
1052  return pGoal->CanRetry();
1053 
1054  }
1055  return false;
1056 }
1057 
1058 /******************************************************************/
1059 /* */
1060 /* */
1061 /******************************************************************/
1062 
1063 bool CGoalManager::QuickStartGoal( uint32 goalId, bool dontAssert )
1064 {
1065  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
1066  if ( !pGoal )
1067  {
1068  if ( dontAssert )
1069  return false;
1070  else
1071  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "QuickStartGoal unable to find goal" ) );
1072  }
1073  pGoal->SetQuickStartFlag();
1074  bool success = pGoal->Activate();
1075 
1076  // set the last goal
1077  if ( success && pGoal->CanRetry() )
1078  m_lastGoal = goalId;
1079 
1080  pGoal->UnsetQuickStartFlag();
1081  return success;
1082 }
1083 
1084 /******************************************************************/
1085 /* */
1086 /* */
1087 /******************************************************************/
1088 
1089 void CGoalManager::RestartLastGoal()
1090 {
1091  if ( m_lastGoal != 0 )
1092  {
1093  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( m_lastGoal );
1094  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1095 
1096  // set the restart flag so the (de)activate scripts knows not to show
1097  // cam anims, etc.
1098  pGoal->SetQuickStartFlag();
1099 
1100  // if ( pGoal->IsActive() )
1101  // pGoal->Deactivate();
1102  DeactivateAllGoals();
1103 
1104  // SKATE SPECIFIC
1105  // kill any sk3_killscripts, as they will screw up the reset skater call
1106  Script::KillSpawnedScriptsThatReferTo( ( CRCD(0xdea3057b,"SK3_KillSkater") ) );
1107  Script::KillSpawnedScriptsThatReferTo( ( CRCD(0xb38ed6b,"SK3_Killskater_Finish") ) );
1108  // END SKATE SPECIFIC
1109 
1110  // kill any blur effect
1111  Script::RunScript(( CRCD(0xbda66e7d,"kill_blur") ) );
1112 
1113  // uint32 reset_checksum = 0;
1114  // pGoal->GetParams()->GetChecksum( "restart_node", &reset_checksum, Script::ASSERT );
1115  // Mdl::Skate * p_skate = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
1116  // p_skate->ResetSkaters( SkateScript::FindNamedNode( reset_checksum ) );
1117 
1118  // clear the trigger exceptions
1119  if ( !pGoal->HasWonGoal() )
1120  {
1121  Script::CStruct* p_params = new Script::CStruct();
1122  p_params->AddChecksum( "goal_id", pGoal->GetGoalId() );
1123  Script::RunScript( CRCD( 0x17c2e09f, "GoalManager_ResetGoalTrigger" ), p_params );
1124  delete p_params;
1125  }
1126 
1127  pGoal->Activate();
1128  pGoal->UnsetQuickStartFlag();
1129  }
1130 }
1131 
1132 
1133 /******************************************************************/
1134 /* */
1135 /* */
1136 /******************************************************************/
1137 
1138 void CGoalManager::RestartStage()
1139 {
1140  int activeGoal = GetActiveGoal();
1141  if ( activeGoal == -1 )
1142  return;
1143 
1144  uint32 key;
1145  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( activeGoal, (int*)&key );
1146  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1147 
1148  pGoal->SetQuickStartFlag();
1149 
1150  if ( pGoal->IsActive() )
1151  {
1152  pGoal->Deactivate( false, false );
1153 
1154  // SKATE SPECIFIC
1155  // kill any sk3_killscripts, as they will screw up the reset skater call
1156  Script::KillSpawnedScriptsThatReferTo( CRCD(0xdea3057b,"SK3_KillSkater") );
1157  Script::KillSpawnedScriptsThatReferTo( ( CRCD(0xb38ed6b,"SK3_Killskater_Finish") ) );
1158  // END SKATE SPECIFIC
1159 
1160  // kill any blur effect
1161  Script::RunScript( ( CRCD(0xbda66e7d,"kill_blur") ) );
1162 
1163  // uint32 reset_checksum = 0;
1164  // pGoal->GetParams()->GetChecksum( "restart_node", &reset_checksum, Script::ASSERT );
1165  // Mdl::Skate * p_skate = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
1166  // p_skate->ResetSkaters( SkateScript::FindNamedNode( reset_checksum ) );
1167 
1168  // clear the trigger exceptions
1169  if ( !pGoal->HasWonGoal() )
1170  {
1171  Script::CStruct* p_params = new Script::CStruct();
1172  p_params->AddChecksum( "goal_id", pGoal->GetGoalId() );
1173  Script::RunScript( CRCD( 0x17c2e09f, "GoalManager_ResetGoalTrigger" ), p_params );
1174  delete p_params;
1175  }
1176 
1177  pGoal->Activate();
1178  pGoal->UnsetQuickStartFlag();
1179  }
1180 }
1181

1184 /* */
1185 /* */
1186 /******************************************************************/

1189 {
1190  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
1191  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1192 
1193  pGoal->CreateGoalFlag( flag );
1194 }*/
1195 
1196 /******************************************************************/
1197 /* */
1198 /* */
1199 /******************************************************************/
1200 
1201 bool CGoalManager::SetGoalFlag( uint32 goalId, uint32 flag, int value )
1202 {
1203  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
1204 
1205  if ( !pGoal )
1206  return false;
1207  if ( pGoal->SetGoalFlag( flag, value ) ) return true;
1208 
1209  return false;
1210 }

1220

1222  return pGoal->AllFlagsSet();
1223 }

1231 {

1233  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1234  return pGoal->GoalFlagSet( flag );
1235 }
1236 
1237 /******************************************************************/
1238 /* */
1239 /* */
1240 /******************************************************************/
1241 bool CGoalManager::CreatedGapGoalIsActive()
1242 {
1243  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
1244  {
1245  uint32 key;
1246  CGoal* p_goal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1247  Dbg_Assert( p_goal );
1248 
1249  if (p_goal->IsActive())
1250  {
1251  Script::CStruct *p_params=p_goal->GetParams();
1252  Script::CArray *p_dummy=NULL;
1253  if (p_params->GetArray(CRCD(0x52d4489e,"required_gaps"),&p_dummy))
1254  {
1255  return true;
1256  }
1257  }
1258  }
1259  return false;
1260 }
1261 
1262 /******************************************************************/
1263 /* */
1264 /* */
1265 /******************************************************************/
1266 
1267 bool CGoalManager::GetCreatedGoalGap(int gapIndex)
1268 {
1269  bool return_value=false;
1270  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
1271  {
1272  uint32 key;
1273  CGoal* p_goal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1274  Dbg_Assert( p_goal );
1275 
1276  return_value=p_goal->GetCreatedGoalGap(gapIndex);
1277  }
1278  return return_value;
1279 }
1280

1282 /* */

1286 Script::CStruct* CGoalManager::GetGoalParams( uint32 goalId )
1287 {
1288  // printf("trying to get params for goalId %x\n", goalId);
1289  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
1290  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1291 
1292  return pGoal->GetParams( );
1293 }

1315  Dbg_MsgAssert( pGoal, ( "Couldn't find goal: %x\n", goalId ) );
1316 
1317  return pGoal->NextRaceWaypoint( goalId );
1318 }

1350 /* */
1351 /******************************************************************/
1352 
1353 bool CGoalManager::SetGraffitiMode( int mode )
1354 {
1355  m_graffitiMode = mode;
1356 
1357 /* // do we need to reset the scores?
1358  if ( mode == 0 )
1359  {
1360  Mdl::Skate* skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
1361  Obj::CTrickObjectManager* p_TrickObjectManager = skate_mod->GetTrickObjectManager();
1362  p_TrickObjectManager->ResetAllTrickObjects();
1363  }
1364 */
1365  return true;
1366 }
1367 
1368 /******************************************************************/
1369 /* */
1370 /* */
1371 /******************************************************************/
1372 
1373 bool CGoalManager::ShouldLogTrickObject()
1374 {
1375  int activeGoal = GetActiveGoal( true );
1376  if ( activeGoal == -1 )
1377  return false;
1378 
1379  uint32 key;
1380  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( activeGoal, (int*)&key );
1381  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1382  return pGoal->ShouldLogTrickObject();
1383 }
1384 
1385 /******************************************************************/
1386 /* */
1387 /* */
1388 /******************************************************************/
1389 
1390 void CGoalManager::GotTrickObject( uint32 clusterId, int score )
1391 {
1392  int activeGoal = GetActiveGoal( true );
1393  if ( activeGoal == -1 ) // no active goal
1394  return;
1395 
1396  uint32 key;
1397  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( activeGoal, (int*)&key );
1398  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1399 
1400  if ( pGoal->IsGraffitiGoal() )
1401  pGoal->GotGraffitiCluster( clusterId, score );
1402  else
1403  pGoal->GotTrickObject( clusterId );
1404 }
1405 
1406 
1407 /******************************************************************/
1408 /* */
1409 /* */
1410 /******************************************************************/
1411 
1412 void CGoalManager::CheckTrickText()
1413 {
1414  int activeGoal = GetActiveGoal( true );
1415 
1416  if ( activeGoal == -1 )
1417  return;
1418 
1419  uint32 key;
1420  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( activeGoal, (int*)&key );
1421 
1422  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1423 
1424  Script::CStruct* p_goal_params = pGoal->GetParams();
1425  if ( pGoal->IsSpecialGoal() || p_goal_params->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x8e6014f6,"create_a_trick") ) )
1426  {
1427  // don't check special goals that are setup with gaps
1428  if ( !p_goal_params->ContainsFlag( "special_gap" ) )
1429  {
1430  if ( pGoal->CheckSpecialGoal() )
1431  {
1432  uint32 goalId = pGoal->GetGoalId();
1433  WinGoal( goalId );
1434  }
1435  }
1436  }
1437  else if ( pGoal->IsTetrisGoal() )
1438  {
1439  CSkatetrisGoal* p_temp = (CSkatetrisGoal*)pGoal;
1440  p_temp->CheckTetrisTricks();
1441  }
1442  else if ( pGoal->IsFindGapsGoal() )
1443  {
1444  CFindGapsGoal *p_temp = (CFindGapsGoal*)pGoal;
1445  p_temp->CheckGaps();
1446  }
1447 }
1448 
1449 /******************************************************************/
1450 /* */
1451 /* */
1452 /******************************************************************/
1453 
1454 void CGoalManager::UnlockGoal( uint32 goalId )
1455 {
1456  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
1457  Dbg_MsgAssert( pGoal, ("Couldn't find goal to unlock") );
1458 
1459  pGoal->UnlockGoal();
1460 }
1461 
1462 /******************************************************************/
1463 /* */
1464 /* */
1465 /******************************************************************/
1466 
1467 bool CGoalManager::HasWonGoal( uint32 goalId )
1468 {
1469  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId, false );
1470 
1471  if ( pGoal )
1472  return pGoal->HasWonGoal();
1473  else
1474  {
1475  // check goal manager params struct in case the goal was in
1476  // another level
1477  int hasWonGoal = 0;
1478  Script::CStruct* pGoalParams;
1479  if ( mp_goalFlags->GetStructure( goalId, &pGoalParams, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
1480  pGoalParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0x49807745,"hasBeaten"), &hasWonGoal, Script::ASSERT );
1481 
1482  return ( hasWonGoal != 0 );
1483  }
1484 }
1485 
1486 /******************************************************************/
1487 /* */
1488 /* */
1489 /******************************************************************/
1490 
1491 bool CGoalManager::GoalIsSelected( uint32 goalId )
1492 {
1493  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
1494  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1495 
1496  return pGoal->IsSelected();
1497 }
1498 
1499 /******************************************************************/
1500 /* */
1501 /* */
1502 /******************************************************************/
1503 
1504 void CGoalManager::ToggleGoalSelection( uint32 goalId )
1505 {
1506  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
1507  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1508 
1509  if( pGoal->IsSelected())
1510  {
1511  pGoal->Deselect();
1512  }
1513  else
1514  {
1515  pGoal->Select();
1516  }
1517 }
1518 
1519 /******************************************************************/
1520 /* */
1521 /* */
1522 /******************************************************************/
1523 
1524 void CGoalManager::GotCounterObject( uint32 goalId )
1525 {
1526  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
1527  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1528 
1529  if ( pGoal->IsActive() )
1530  pGoal->GotCounterObject();
1531 }
1532

1534 /* */
1535 /* */

1539 {
1540  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
1541  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1542 
1543  return pGoal->CounterGoalDone();
1544 }

1546 /******************************************************************/
1547 /* */
1548 /* */
1549 /******************************************************************/
1550 
1551 void CGoalManager::SpendGoalPoints( int num )
1552 {
1553  m_goalPoints -= num;
1554 }
1555 
1556 /******************************************************************/
1557 /* */
1558 /* */
1559 /******************************************************************/
1560 
1561 void CGoalManager::AddGoalPoint()
1562 {
1563  m_goalPoints++;
1564  m_totalGoalPointsEarned++;
1565  Script::RunScript( CRCD(0x888ef05e,"GoalManager_ShowGoalPoints") );
1566 }
1567 
1568 
1569 /******************************************************************/
1570 /* */
1571 /* */
1572 /******************************************************************/
1573 
1574 bool CGoalManager::HasGoalPoints( int num )
1575 {
1576  return ( m_goalPoints >= num );
1577 }
1578

1585 int CGoalManager::GetNumberOfGoalPoints()
1586 {
1587  return m_goalPoints;
1588 }

1592 /* */
1593 /* */
1594 /******************************************************************/

1599 }
1600 
1601 /******************************************************************/
1602 /* */
1603 /* */
1604 /******************************************************************/
1605 
1606 void CGoalManager::ClearGoalPoints()
1607 {
1608  m_goalPoints = 0;
1609  m_totalGoalPointsEarned = 0;
1610 }
1611 
1612 /******************************************************************/
1613 /* */
1614 /* */
1615 /******************************************************************/
1616 
1617 void CGoalManager::AddCash( int amount )
1618 {
1619  m_cash += amount;
1620  m_totalCash += amount;
1621  if ( GetNumActiveGoals() < 1 )
1622  {
1623  Script::RunScript( CRCD(0x888ef05e,"GoalManager_ShowGoalPoints") );
1624  }
1625 }
1626 
1627 /******************************************************************/
1628 /* */
1629 /* */
1630 /******************************************************************/
1631 
1632 bool CGoalManager::SpendCash( int amount )
1633 {
1634  if ( amount <= m_cash)
1635  {
1636  m_cash -= amount;
1637  return true;
1638  }
1639  return false;
1640 }
1641 
1642 /******************************************************************/
1643 /* */
1644 /* */
1645 /******************************************************************/
1646 
1647 int CGoalManager::GetCash( bool get_total )
1648 {
1649  if ( get_total )
1650  return m_totalCash;
1651  return m_cash;
1652 }
1653 
1654 /******************************************************************/
1655 /* */
1656 /* */
1657 /******************************************************************/
1658 
1659 bool CGoalManager::HasBeatenGoalWithProset( const char* proset_prefix )
1660 {
1661  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
1662  {
1663  uint32 key;
1664  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1665  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1666 
1667  if ( pGoal->HasWonGoal() && pGoal->HasProset( proset_prefix ) )
1668  {
1669  return true;
1670  }
1671  }
1672  return false;
1673 }
1674 
1675 
1676 /******************************************************************/
1677 /* */
1678 /* */
1679 /******************************************************************/
1680 
1681 void CGoalManager::LevelUnload()
1682 {
1683  // don't do this in net games!
1684  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
1685  if ( gamenet_man->InNetGame() )
1686  return;
1687 
1688  // save goal manager params
1689  Script::CStruct *p_manager_params = new Script::CStruct();
1690 
1691  p_manager_params->AddInteger( CRCD(0x6abb6fcb,"goalPoints"), m_goalPoints );
1692  p_manager_params->AddInteger( CRCD(0x79ed60aa,"totalGoalPointsEarned"), m_totalGoalPointsEarned );
1693  p_manager_params->AddInteger( CRCD(0xf9461a46,"cash"), m_cash );
1694  p_manager_params->AddInteger( CRCD(0x875e89bb,"total_cash"), m_totalCash );
1695  // p_manager_params->AddInteger( "numGoalsToPro", m_numGoalsToPro );
1696  p_manager_params->AddInteger( CRCD(0x46f71d38,"numGoalsBeaten"), m_numGoalsBeaten );
1697 
1698  p_manager_params->AddInteger( CRCD(0xf884773c,"currentChapter"), m_currentChapter );
1699  p_manager_params->AddInteger( CRCD(0xaf1575eb,"currentStage"), m_currentStage );
1700  p_manager_params->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x7e73362b,"sponsor"), m_sponsor );
1701  p_manager_params->AddStructure( CRCD(0x3b1f59e0,"team"), mp_team );
1702  p_manager_params->AddStructure( CRCD(0xb13d98d3,"difficulty_levels"), mp_difficulty_levels );
1703 
1704 /* int proChallengesUnlocked = 0;
1705  if ( m_proChallengesUnlocked )
1706  proChallengesUnlocked = 1;
1707  p_manager_params->AddInteger( CRCD(0x24c226fa,"proChallengesUnlocked"), proChallengesUnlocked );
1708 */
1709  int isPro = 0;
1710  if ( m_isPro )
1711  isPro = 1;
1712  p_manager_params->AddInteger( CRCD(0x40801d41,"isPro"), isPro );
1713 
1714  // p_manager_params->AddStructure( CRCD(0xf8478579,"proSpecificChallenges"), mp_proSpecificChallenges );
1715 
1716  mp_goalFlags->AddStructure( CRCD(0x23d4170a,"GoalManager_Params"), p_manager_params );
1717 
1718  delete p_manager_params;
1719 
1720  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
1721  {
1722  uint32 key;
1723  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1724  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1725  Script::CStruct* pGoalParams = pGoal->GetParams();
1726 
1727  if ( !pGoalParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x3d1cab0b,"null_goal") ) && !pGoal->IsEditedGoal() ) // K: Don't add edited goals
1728  {
1729  Script::CStruct* p_temp = new Script::CStruct();
1730  pGoal->GetSaveData( p_temp );
1731  mp_goalFlags->AddStructure( pGoal->GetGoalId(), p_temp );
1732  delete p_temp;
1733  }
1734  }
1735 }
1736 
1737 /******************************************************************/
1738 /* */
1739 /* */
1740 /******************************************************************/
1741 
1742 void CGoalManager::LevelLoad()
1743 {
1744  Script::CComponent* p_comp = NULL;
1745  p_comp = mp_goalFlags->GetNextComponent( p_comp );
1746 
1747  while ( p_comp )
1748  {
1749  Script::CComponent* p_next = mp_goalFlags->GetNextComponent( p_comp );
1750 
1751  // special goal manager params structure
1752  if ( p_comp->mNameChecksum == CRCD( 0x23d4170a, "GoalManager_Params" ) )
1753  {
1754  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0x6abb6fcb,"goalPoints"), &m_goalPoints, Script::NO_ASSERT );
1755  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0x79ed60aa,"totalGoalPointsEarned"), &m_totalGoalPointsEarned, Script::NO_ASSERT );
1756  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0xf9461a46,"cash"), &m_cash, Script::NO_ASSERT );
1757  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0x875e89bb,"total_cash"), &m_totalCash, Script::NO_ASSERT );
1758  // p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( "numGoalsToPro", &m_numGoalsToPro, Script::NO_ASSERT );
1759  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0x46f71d38,"numGoalsBeaten"), &m_numGoalsBeaten, Script::NO_ASSERT );
1760 
1761  int auto_change_chapter_and_stage = 0;
1762  auto_change_chapter_and_stage = Script::GetInteger( CRCD(0x5a1d8804,"auto_change_chapter_and_stage"), Script::NO_ASSERT );
1763  if ( auto_change_chapter_and_stage == 0 )
1764  {
1765  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0xf884773c,"currentChapter"), &m_currentChapter, Script::NO_ASSERT );
1766  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0xaf1575eb,"currentStage"), &m_currentStage, Script::NO_ASSERT );
1767  }
1768  p_comp->mpStructure->GetChecksum( CRCD(0x7e73362b,"sponsor"), &m_sponsor, Script::ASSERT );
1769 
1770  Script::CStruct* p_copy;
1771  p_comp->mpStructure->GetStructure( CRCD(0x3b1f59e0,"team"), &p_copy, Script::ASSERT );
1772  mp_team->Clear();
1773  mp_team->AppendStructure( p_copy );
1774 
1775  Script::CStruct* p_diff_copy;
1776  p_comp->mpStructure->GetStructure( CRCD(0xb13d98d3,"difficulty_levels"), &p_diff_copy, Script::ASSERT );
1777  mp_difficulty_levels->Clear();
1778  mp_difficulty_levels->AppendStructure( p_diff_copy );
1779 
1780  int isPro;
1781  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0x40801d41,"isPro"), &isPro, Script::ASSERT );
1782  if ( isPro != 0 )
1783  TurnPro();
1784 
1785 /* int proChallengesUnlocked;
1786  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0x24c226fa,"proChallengesUnlocked"), &proChallengesUnlocked, Script::ASSERT );
1787  if ( proChallengesUnlocked != 0 )
1788  m_proChallengesUnlocked = true;
1789 
1790  Script::CStruct* p_copy;
1791  p_comp->mpStructure->GetStructure( CRCD(0xf8478579,"proSpecificChallenges"), &p_copy, Script::ASSERT );
1792  mp_proSpecificChallenges->AppendStructure( p_copy );
1793 */
1794  }
1795  else
1796  {
1797  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( p_comp->mNameChecksum, false );
1798  if ( pGoal )
1799  pGoal->LoadSaveData( p_comp->mpStructure );
1800  }
1801 
1802  p_comp = p_next;
1803  }
1804 
1805  // make sure to unlock any pro goals (they may have turned pro in another level)
1806  if ( m_isPro )
1807  TurnPro();
1808 
1809  // ...and unlock any pro challenges
1810  // if ( m_proChallengesUnlocked )
1811  // UnlockProSpecificChallenges();
1812 }
1813 
1814 /******************************************************************/
1815 /* */
1816 /* */
1817 /******************************************************************/
1818 
1819 int CGoalManager::NumGoalsBeatenBy( int obj_id )
1820 {
1821  int i, num_beaten;
1822  CGoal* pGoal;
1823 
1824  num_beaten = 0;
1825  for ( i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
1826  {
1827  uint32 key;
1828  pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1829  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1830 
1831  if( pGoal->GetParents()->m_relative != 0 )
1832  {
1833  continue;
1834  }
1835 
1836  if( pGoal->HasWonGoal( obj_id ))
1837  {
1838  num_beaten++;
1839  }
1840  }
1841 
1842  return num_beaten;
1843 }
1844 
1845 /******************************************************************/
1846 /* */
1847 /* */
1848 /******************************************************************/
1849 
1850 int CGoalManager::NumGoalsBeatenByTeam( int team_id )
1851 {
1852  int i, num_beaten;
1853  CGoal* pGoal;
1854 
1855  num_beaten = 0;
1856  for ( i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
1857  {
1858  uint32 key;
1859  pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1860  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1861 
1862  if( pGoal->GetParents()->m_relative != 0 )
1863  {
1864  continue;
1865  }
1866  if( pGoal->HasTeamWonGoal( team_id ))
1867  {
1868  num_beaten++;
1869  }
1870  }
1871 
1872  return num_beaten;
1873 }
1874 
1875 /******************************************************************/
1876 /* */
1877 /* */
1878 /******************************************************************/
1879 
1880 int CGoalManager::NumGoalsBeaten()
1881 {
1882  int i, num_beaten;
1883  CGoal* pGoal;
1884 
1885  num_beaten = 0;
1886  for ( i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
1887  {
1888  uint32 key;
1889  pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1890  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1891 
1892  if( pGoal->GetParents()->m_relative != 0 )
1893  {
1894  continue;
1895  }
1896  if( pGoal->HasWonGoal())
1897  {
1898  num_beaten++;
1899  }
1900  }
1901 
1902  return num_beaten;
1903 }
1904 
1905 /******************************************************************/
1906 /* */
1907 /* */
1908 /******************************************************************/
1909 
1910 int CGoalManager::NumGoalsBeatenInLevel( int levelNum, bool count_pro_specific_challenges )
1911 {
1912  // store all the goal info in the goalmanager's struct
1913  // so we can grab it all in one place
1914  LevelUnload();
1915 
1916  int numbeat = 0;
1917  Script::CComponent* p_comp = mp_goalFlags->GetNextComponent( NULL );
1918  Script::CComponent* p_next = NULL;
1919  while ( p_comp )
1920  {
1921  // printf("checking p_comp\n");
1922  p_next = mp_goalFlags->GetNextComponent( p_comp );
1923 
1924  int p_comp_levelNum = 0;
1925  if ( p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0x1a4cde06,"levelNum"), &p_comp_levelNum, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
1926  {
1927  // printf("found levelNum\n");
1928 /* if ( !count_pro_specific_challenges )
1929  {
1930  int isProSpecificChallenge;
1931  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0x3dbe3121,"isProSpecificChallenge"), &isProSpecificChallenge, Script::ASSERT );
1932  if ( isProSpecificChallenge == 1 )
1933  {
1934  p_comp = p_next;
1935  continue;
1936  }
1937  }
1938 */
1939  int hasBeaten = 0;
1940  p_comp->mpStructure->GetInteger( CRCD(0x49807745,"hasBeaten"), &hasBeaten, Script::NO_ASSERT );
1941  if ( p_comp_levelNum == levelNum && hasBeaten )
1942  {
1943  numbeat++;
1944  }
1945  }
1946  p_comp = p_next;
1947  }
1948  return numbeat;
1949 }
1950 
1951 /******************************************************************/
1952 /* */
1953 /* */
1954 /******************************************************************/
1955 
1956 void CGoalManager::UnlockAllGoals()
1957 {
1958  m_isPro = true;
1959  // m_proChallengesUnlocked = true;
1960 
1961  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
1962  {
1963  uint32 key;
1964  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1965  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1966  // pGoal->UnlockGoal();
1967  pGoal->SetHasSeen();
1968  }
1969 }
1970 
1971 
1972 /******************************************************************/
1973 /* */
1974 /* */
1975 /******************************************************************/
1976 
1977 void CGoalManager::TurnPro()
1978 {
1979  m_isPro = true;
1980  // m_proChallengesUnlocked = true;
1981 
1982  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
1983  {
1984  uint32 key;
1985  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
1986  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
1987 
1988  if ( pGoal->IsProGoal() && pGoal->IsLocked() )
1989  {
1990  pGoal->UnlockGoal();
1991  }
1992  }
1993 }
1994 
1995 
1996 /******************************************************************/
1997 /* */
1998 /* */
1999 /******************************************************************/
2000 
2001 void CGoalManager::SetStartTime( uint32 goalId )
2002 {
2003  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2004  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2005 
2006  pGoal->SetStartTime();
2007 }
2008

2015 {
2016  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2017  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2018 
2019  return pGoal->CheckMinigameRecord( value );
2020 }

2077 /******************************************************************/
2078 /* */
2079 /* */
2080 /******************************************************************/
2081 
2082 void CGoalManager::PlayGoalStartStream( Script::CStruct* pParams )
2083 {
2084  uint32 goalId;
2085  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
2086 
2087  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2088  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2089 
2090  pGoal->mp_goalPed->PlayGoalStartStream( pParams );
2091 }
2092 
2093 /******************************************************************/
2094 /* */
2095 /* */
2096 /******************************************************************/
2097 
2098 void CGoalManager::PlayGoalWaitStream( uint32 goalId )
2099 {
2100  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2101  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2102 
2103  pGoal->mp_goalPed->PlayGoalWaitStream();
2104 }
2105 
2106 /******************************************************************/
2107 /* */
2108 /* */
2109 /******************************************************************/
2110 
2111 void CGoalManager::PlayGoalStream( Script::CStruct* pParams )
2112 {
2113  uint32 goalId;
2114  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
2115 
2116  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2117  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2118 
2119  // if we got a specific stream, just play it and quit
2120  uint32 stream_checksum = 0;
2121  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0x1a4e4fb9,"vo"), &stream_checksum, Script::NO_ASSERT );
2122  if ( stream_checksum )
2123  {
2124  pGoal->mp_goalPed->PlayGoalStream( stream_checksum );
2125  return;
2126  }
2127 
2128  // check for type
2129  const char* type = NULL;
2130  if ( pParams->GetString( CRCD(0x7321a8d6,"type"), &type, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
2131  {
2132  pGoal->mp_goalPed->PlayGoalStream( type, pParams );
2133  return;
2134  }
2135 
2136  // you gotta have one or the other
2137  if ( !type && !stream_checksum )
2138  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ("GoalManager_PlayGoalStream called without a type or vo checksum") );
2139 }
2140 
2141 /******************************************************************/
2142 /* */
2143 /* */
2144 /******************************************************************/
2145 
2146 void CGoalManager::StopCurrentStream( uint32 goalId )
2147 {
2148  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2149  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2150 
2151  pGoal->mp_goalPed->StopCurrentStream();
2152 }
2153 
2154 
2155 /******************************************************************/
2156 /* */
2157 /* */
2158 /******************************************************************/
2159 
2160 void CGoalManager::PlayGoalWinStream( Script::CStruct* pParams )
2161 {
2162  uint32 goalId;
2163  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
2164 
2165  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2166  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2167 
2168  pGoal->mp_goalPed->PlayGoalWinStream( pParams );
2169 }
2170 
2171 
2172 /******************************************************************/
2173 /* */
2174 /* */

2178 {
2179  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2180  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2181 
2182  pGoal->PauseGoal();
2183 }

2225 /******************************************************************/
2226 /* */
2227 /* */
2228 /******************************************************************/
2229 
2230 void CGoalManager::UnBeatAllGoals()
2231 {
2232  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
2233 
2234  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
2235  {
2236  uint32 key;
2237  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
2238  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2239 
2240  if ( pGoal->UnBeatGoal() && !gamenet_man->InNetGame() )
2241  {
2242  // m_numGoalsToPro++;
2243  m_numGoalsBeaten--;
2244  m_goalPoints--;
2245  m_totalGoalPointsEarned--;
2246  }
2247  }
2248  // clear the goal manager's memory of goals too
2249  if ( !gamenet_man->InNetGame() )
2250  mp_goalFlags->Clear();
2251 
2252  if ( GetNumActiveGoals() == 0 )
2253  {
2254  if( CFuncs::ScriptInMultiplayerGame( NULL, NULL ) == false )
2255  {
2256  Script::RunScript( CRCD(0x888ef05e,"GoalManager_ShowGoalPoints") );
2257  }
2258  }
2259 }
2260 
2261 /******************************************************************/
2262 /* */
2263 /* */
2264 /******************************************************************/
2265 
2266 void CGoalManager::AddViewGoalsList()
2267 {
2268 
2269  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
2270  Script::CArray* p_ordered_goals = new Script::CArray();
2271  Script::CArray* p_unordered_goals = new Script::CArray();
2272  p_ordered_goals->SetSizeAndType( numGoals, ESYMBOLTYPE_NAME );
2273  p_unordered_goals->SetSizeAndType( numGoals, ESYMBOLTYPE_NAME );
2274 
2275  int num_ordered_goals = 0;
2276  int num_unordered_goals = 0;
2277 
2278  // divide the list into goals with ordinals and goals without
2279  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
2280  {
2281  uint32 key;
2282  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
2283  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2284 
2285  if ( pGoal->GetParams()->ContainsComponentNamed( CRCD(0x9b048fc,"ordinal") ) )
2286  {
2287  p_ordered_goals->SetChecksum( num_ordered_goals, pGoal->GetGoalId() );
2288  num_ordered_goals++;
2289  }
2290  else
2291  {
2292  p_unordered_goals->SetChecksum( num_unordered_goals, pGoal->GetGoalId() );
2293  num_unordered_goals++;
2294  }
2295  }
2296 
2297  // sort the list of goals with ordinals
2298  // printf("there are %i ordered goals\n", num_ordered_goals);
2299  for ( int i = 0; i < num_ordered_goals; i++ )
2300  {
2301  // inefficient sorting, but there's only ~20 things - brad
2302  for ( int j = i; j < num_ordered_goals; j++ )
2303  {
2304  uint32 temp = p_ordered_goals->GetChecksum( j );
2305  CGoal* p_temp_goal = GetGoal( temp );
2306  Dbg_Assert( p_temp_goal );
2307  int ordinal_check;
2308  p_temp_goal->GetParams()->GetInteger( CRCD(0x9b048fc,"ordinal"), &ordinal_check, Script::ASSERT );
2309  Dbg_MsgAssert( ordinal_check - 1 < num_ordered_goals, ( "Ordinal value %i too big.", ordinal_check ) );
2310  if ( ordinal_check - 1 == i )
2311  {
2312  if ( j == i )
2313  break;
2314 
2315  // swap them
2316  uint32 temp2 = p_ordered_goals->GetChecksum( i );
2317  int double_check;
2318  GetGoal( temp2 )->GetParams()->GetInteger( CRCD(0x9b048fc,"ordinal"), &double_check, Script::ASSERT );
2319  Dbg_MsgAssert( double_check != i, ( "Found ordinal %i twice", double_check ) );
2320 
2321  p_ordered_goals->SetChecksum( i, temp );
2322  p_ordered_goals->SetChecksum( j, temp2 );
2323  break;
2324  }
2325  }
2326  }
2327 
2328  // tack on the list of unordered goals
2329  for ( int i = 0; i < num_unordered_goals; i++ )
2330  p_ordered_goals->SetChecksum( i + num_ordered_goals, p_unordered_goals->GetChecksum( i ) );
2331 
2332  // populate the menu
2333  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
2334  {
2335  uint32 goalId = p_ordered_goals->GetChecksum( i );
2336  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2337  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2338  Script::CStruct* pGoalParams = pGoal->GetParams();
2339 
2340  const char* p_view_goals_text = NULL;
2341  pGoal->GetViewGoalsText( &p_view_goals_text );
2342 
2343  // skip goals without an associated text (eg, minigames)
2344  if ( !p_view_goals_text )
2345  continue;
2346 
2347  // skip pro goals if we're not pro
2348  if ( !IsPro() && pGoalParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xd303a1a3,"pro_goal") ) )
2349  continue;
2350 
2351  // skip pro challenges if we haven't unlocked them.
2352  // if ( !ProSpecificChallengesUnlocked() && pGoalParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xe0f96410,"pro_specific_challenge") ) )
2353  // continue;
2354 
2355  // skip pro specific challenges if we're not the right skater
2356 /* if ( !pGoal->HasWonGoal() && !IsPro() && pGoalParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xe0f96410,"pro_specific_challenge") ) )
2357  {
2358  // check the current skater against the listed pro
2359  Script::CStruct* pLastNames = Script::GetStructure( CRCD(0x621d1828,"goal_pro_last_name_checksums"), Script::ASSERT );
2360  const char* pProChallengeProName;
2361  pGoalParams->GetString( CRCD(0x4a91eceb,"pro_challenge_pro_name"), &pProChallengeProName, Script::ASSERT );
2362  uint32 last_name = 0;
2363  pLastNames->GetChecksum( Script::GenerateCRC( pProChallengeProName ), &last_name, Script::NO_ASSERT );
2364  Mdl::Skate * pSkate = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
2365  Obj::CSkaterProfile* pSkaterProfile = pSkate->GetCurrentProfile();
2366  if ( last_name && last_name != pSkaterProfile->GetSkaterNameChecksum() )
2367  continue;
2368  }
2369 */
2370  if( pGoal->IsNetGoal())
2371  continue;
2372 
2373  // create the screen element
2374  Script::CStruct* p_elem_params = new Script::CStruct();
2375  uint32 id = pGoal->GetGoalId();
2376 
2377  // add the id so we can use the same struct when calling the set_events script below
2378  p_elem_params->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x9982e501,"goal_id"), id );
2379  p_elem_params->AddString( CRCD(0xc4745838,"text"), p_view_goals_text );
2380 
2381  // check for a win record
2382  uint32 record_type;
2383  if ( pGoal->HasWonGoal() )
2384  {
2385  int record = 0;
2386  char record_string[128];
2387 
2388  // special case for competition
2389  if ( pGoal->IsCompetition() )
2390  {
2391  pGoalParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0xc22a2b72,"win_record"), &record, Script::NO_ASSERT );
2392  sprintf( record_string, "%i", record );
2393  switch ( record )
2394  {
2395  case 1:
2396  strcat( record_string, "st place" );
2397  break;
2398  case 2:
2399  strcat( record_string, "nd place" );
2400  break;
2401  case 3:
2402  strcat( record_string, "rd place" );
2403  break;
2404  default:
2405  Dbg_Message( "WARNING: competition place is %i", record );
2406  break;
2407  }
2408  p_elem_params->AddString( CRCD(0xbb48af8b,"win_record_string"), record_string );
2409  }
2410  else if ( pGoalParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0x96963902,"record_type"), &record_type, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
2411  {
2412  // For the purposes of supporting different record types in the future,
2413  // I've left some repeated code within each block.
2414  if ( record_type == ( CRCD(0xcd66c8ae,"score") ) )
2415  {
2416  pGoalParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0xc22a2b72,"win_record"), &record, Script::NO_ASSERT );
2417  sprintf( record_string, "%s", Str::PrintThousands( record ) );
2418 
2419  p_elem_params->AddString( CRCD(0xbb48af8b,"win_record_string"), record_string );
2420  }
2421  else if ( record_type == ( CRCD(0x906b67ba,"time") ) )
2422  {
2423  int record = 0;
2424  pGoalParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0xc22a2b72,"win_record"), &record, Script::NO_ASSERT );
2425 
2426  // break down into minutes, seconds, fraction
2427  int min, sec, fraction;
2428  sec = record / 1000;
2429  min = ( sec / 60 );
2430  sec -= ( min * 60 );
2431  fraction = ( ( record % 1000 ) / 10 );
2432  sprintf( record_string, "%i:%02i.%02i", min, sec, fraction );
2433 
2434  p_elem_params->AddString( CRCD(0xbb48af8b,"win_record_string"), record_string );
2435  }
2436  }
2437  else
2438  {
2439  p_elem_params->AddChecksum( NONAME, CRCD(0xc80e196,"no_record_type") );
2440  }
2441  }
2442 
2443  // create the item
2444  Script::RunScript( CRCD(0x380aea65,"view_goals_menu_add_item"), p_elem_params );
2445 
2446  delete p_elem_params;
2447  }
2448 
2449  // cleanup!
2450  Script::CleanUpArray( p_ordered_goals );
2451  Script::CleanUpArray( p_unordered_goals );
2452  delete p_ordered_goals;
2453  delete p_unordered_goals;
2454 }
2455 
2456 /******************************************************************/
2457 /* */
2458 /* */
2459 /******************************************************************/
2460 
2461 void CGoalManager::AddGoalChoices( bool selected_only )
2462 {
2463 
2464  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
2465  {
2466  uint32 key;
2467  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
2468  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2469 
2470  const char* p_view_goals_text = NULL;
2471  pGoal->ReplaceTrickText();
2472  pGoal->GetViewGoalsText( &p_view_goals_text );
2473 
2474  // skip goals without an associated text (eg, minigames)
2475  if ( !p_view_goals_text )
2476  {
2477  continue;
2478  }
2479 
2480  if( pGoal->IsNetGoal())
2481  {
2482  continue;
2483  }
2484 
2485  if( pGoal->IsMinigame())
2486  {
2487  continue;
2488  }
2489 
2490  if( pGoal->GetParents()->m_relative != 0 )
2491  {
2492  continue;
2493  }
2494 
2495  if( GameNet::Manager::ScriptIsHost( NULL, NULL ))
2496  {
2497  // if( pGoal->HasSeenGoal() == false )
2498  // {
2499  // continue;
2500  // }
2501 
2502  // if( pGoal->IsLocked())
2503  // {
2504  // continue;
2505  // }
2506  }
2507 
2508  if( selected_only )
2509  {
2510  if( !pGoal->IsSelected())
2511  {
2512 
2513  continue;
2514  }
2515  }
2516 
2517  // create the screen element
2518  Script::CStruct* p_elem_params = new Script::CStruct();
2519  uint32 id = pGoal->GetGoalId();
2520 
2521 
2522  // add the id so we can use the same struct when calling the set_events script below
2523  p_elem_params->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x9982e501,"goal_id"), id );
2524  p_elem_params->AddChecksum( CRCD(0xc2719fb0,"parent"), CRCD( 0x4d49ac0a, "current_menu" ) );
2525  p_elem_params->AddString( CRCD(0xc4745838,"text"), p_view_goals_text );
2526  p_elem_params->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x2f6bf72d,"font"), CRCD( 0x8aba15ec, "small" ) );
2527  p_elem_params->AddInteger( CRCD(0x13b9da7b,"scale"), 0 );
2528 
2529 
2530  // set initial color and events for this item
2531  if( selected_only )
2532  {
2533  Script::RunScript( CRCD(0xe704c86c,"view_selected_goals_menu_set_events"), p_elem_params);
2534  }
2535  else
2536  {
2537  Script::RunScript( CRCD(0x6790ac11,"choose_goals_menu_set_events"), p_elem_params);
2538  }
2539  // normally, script won't be updated until next frame -- we want it NOW
2540  // p_new_script->Update();
2541 
2542  delete p_elem_params;
2543  }
2544 }
2545 
2546 /******************************************************************/
2547 /* */
2548 /* */
2549 /******************************************************************/
2550 
2551 bool CGoalManager::GoalIsLocked( uint32 goalId )
2552 {
2553  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId, false );
2554 
2555  if ( pGoal )
2556  {
2557  return pGoal->IsLocked();
2558  }
2559  else
2560  {
2561  // check goal manager params struct in case the goal was in
2562  // another level
2563  int goalLocked = 0;
2564  Script::CStruct* pGoalParams;
2565  if ( mp_goalFlags->GetStructure( goalId, &pGoalParams, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
2566  pGoalParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0xd3e93882,"isLocked"), &goalLocked, Script::ASSERT );
2567 
2568  return ( goalLocked != 0 );
2569  }
2570 }
2571 
2572 /******************************************************************/
2573 /* */
2574 /* */
2575 /******************************************************************/
2576 
2577 CGoal* CGoalManager::IsInCompetition()
2578 {
2579  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
2580  {
2581  uint32 key;
2582  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
2583  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2584 
2585  if ( pGoal->IsCompetition() && pGoal->IsActive() )
2586  {
2587  return pGoal;
2588  }
2589  }
2590  return NULL;
2591 }

2594 /******************************************************************/
2595 /* */
2596 /* */
2597 /******************************************************************/
2598 
2599 void CGoalManager::GetGoalAnimations( uint32 goalId, const char* type, Script::CScript* pScript )
2600 {
2601  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2602  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2603 
2604  uint32 array_name = pGoal->mp_goalPed->GetGoalAnimations( type );
2605  // Dbg_Assert( p_anims_array );
2606 
2607  // never know
2608  pScript->GetParams()->RemoveComponent( CRCD(0x18653764,"pro_stuff") );
2609  if ( array_name )
2610  pScript->GetParams()->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x18653764,"pro_stuff"), array_name );
2611 }
2612 
2613 
2614 /******************************************************************/
2615 /* */
2616 /* */
2617 /******************************************************************/
2618 
2619 uint32 CGoalManager::GetRandomBettingMinigame()
2620 {
2621  // create an index array and randomize
2622  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
2623  int* indexes = new int[numGoals];
2624  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
2625  indexes[i] = i;
2626  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals * 5; i++ )
2627  {
2628  int aIndex = Mth::Rnd( numGoals );
2629  int bIndex = Mth::Rnd( numGoals );
2630  int a = indexes[aIndex];
2631  indexes[aIndex] = indexes[bIndex];
2632  indexes[bIndex] = a;
2633  }
2634 
2635  // look through until we find one that's suitable
2636  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
2637  {
2638  uint32 key;
2639  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( indexes[i], (int*)&key );
2640  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2641 
2642  if ( pGoal->IsBettingGame() )
2643  {
2644  delete[] indexes;
2645  return pGoal->GetGoalId();
2646  }
2647  }
2648  delete[] indexes;
2649  return 0;
2650 }
2651 
2652 /******************************************************************/
2653 /* */
2654 /* */
2655 /******************************************************************/
2656 
2657 bool CGoalManager::EndRunCalled( uint32 goalId )
2658 {
2659  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2660  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2661 
2662  return pGoal->EndRunCalled();
2663 }
2664 
2665 /******************************************************************/
2666 /* */
2667 /* */
2668 /******************************************************************/
2669 
2670 uint32 CGoalManager::GetBettingGuyId()
2671 {
2672  // find the betting guy
2673  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
2674  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
2675  {
2676  uint32 key;
2677  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
2678  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2679 
2680  if ( pGoal->IsBettingGuy() )
2681  {
2682  return pGoal->GetGoalId();
2683  }
2684  }
2685  return 0;
2686 }
2687 
2688 /******************************************************************/
2689 /* */
2690 /* */
2691 /******************************************************************/
2692 
2693 void CGoalManager::DeactivateMinigamesWithTimer()
2694 {
2695  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
2696  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
2697  {
2698  uint32 key;
2699  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
2700  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2701 
2702  if ( pGoal->IsMinigame() && pGoal->IsActive() && pGoal->ShouldUseTimer() )
2703  pGoal->Deactivate();
2704  }
2705 }

2708 /* */
2709 /* */

2712 Script::CStruct* CGoalManager::GetGoalManagerParams()
2713 {
2714  return mp_goalFlags;
2715 }

2717 
2718 /******************************************************************/
2719 /* */
2720 /* */
2721 /******************************************************************/
2722 
2723 bool CGoalManager::ReplaceTrickText( uint32 goalId )
2724 {
2725  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2726  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2727 
2728  return pGoal->ReplaceTrickText();
2729 }
2730 
2731 /******************************************************************/
2732 /* */
2733 /* */
2734 /******************************************************************/
2735 
2736 bool CGoalManager::ReplaceTrickText( uint32 goalId, const char* p_old_string, char* p_new_string, uint out_buffer_size )
2737 {
2738 #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
2739  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId );
2740  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2741 #endif // __NOPT_ASSERT__
2742 
2743  // get the key combo array
2744  Script::CStruct* p_goal_params = GetGoalParams( goalId );
2745  Script::CArray* p_key_combo;
2746  p_goal_params->GetArray( CRCD(0x79704516,"key_combos"), &p_key_combo, Script::ASSERT );
2747 
2748  // build the string arrays
2749  Script::CArray* p_key = new Script::CArray();
2750  Script::CArray* p_trick = new Script::CArray();
2751  int size = p_key_combo->GetSize();
2752  p_key->SetSizeAndType( size, ESYMBOLTYPE_STRING );
2753  p_trick->SetSizeAndType( size, ESYMBOLTYPE_STRING );
2754 
2755  int premade_cat_index = -1;
2756  if ( p_goal_params->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x8e6014f6,"create_a_trick") ) )
2757  {
2758  p_goal_params->GetInteger( CRCD(0x5b077ce1,"trickName"), &premade_cat_index, Script::ASSERT );
2759  }
2760 
2761  if ( !fill_trick_and_key_combo_arrays( p_key_combo, p_key, p_trick, premade_cat_index ) )
2762  {
2763  Script::CleanUpArray( p_key );
2764  Script::CleanUpArray( p_trick );
2765  delete p_key;
2766  delete p_trick;
2767  return false;
2768  }
2769 
2770  find_and_replace_trick_string( p_old_string, p_new_string, p_key, p_trick, out_buffer_size );
2771 
2772  // cleanup!
2773  Script::CleanUpArray( p_key );
2774  Script::CleanUpArray( p_trick );
2775  delete p_key;
2776  delete p_trick;
2777 
2778  return true;
2779 }
2780 
2781 
2782 /******************************************************************/
2783 /* */
2784 /* */
2785 /******************************************************************/
2786 
2787 void CGoalManager::ReplaceAllTrickText()
2788 {
2789  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
2790  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
2791  {
2792  uint32 key;
2793  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
2794  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2795 
2796  if ( pGoal->IsInitialized() )
2797  pGoal->ReplaceTrickText();
2798  }
2799 }
2800 
2801 /******************************************************************/
2802 /* */
2803 /* */
2804 /******************************************************************/
2805 /*
2806 void CGoalManager::UnlockProSpecificChallenges()
2807 {
2808  m_proChallengesUnlocked = true;
2809  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
2810  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
2811  {
2812  uint32 key;
2813  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
2814  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2815 
2816  if ( pGoal->GetParams()->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xe0f96410,"pro_specific_challenge") ) )
2817  {
2818  // only unlock it if it's beaten or we're using the right skater
2819  if ( pGoal->HasWonGoal() || pGoal->mp_goalPed->ProIsCurrentSkater() )
2820  pGoal->UnlockGoal();
2821  }
2822  }
2823 }
2824 */
2825 /******************************************************************/
2826 /* */
2827 /* */
2828 /******************************************************************/
2829 /*
2830 bool CGoalManager::ProSpecificChallengesUnlocked()
2831 {
2832  return m_proChallengesUnlocked;
2833 }
2834 */
2835

2918  return true;
2919  return false;

2923 /******************************************************************/
2924 /* */
2925 /* */
2926 /******************************************************************/
2927 
2928 Script::CStruct* CGoalManager::GetGoalAttemptInfo()
2929 {
2930  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
2931  int totalStarts = 0;
2932  Script::CStruct* attemptInfo = new Script::CStruct();
2933 
2934  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
2935  {
2936  uint32 key;
2937  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
2938  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
2939  if ( !pGoal->IsMinigame() && !pGoal->IsNetGoal() && pGoal->HasWonGoal() )
2940  totalStarts += pGoal->GetNumberOfTimesGoalStarted();
2941  }
2942  attemptInfo->AddInteger( CRCD(0xd023adbe,"totalStarts"), totalStarts );
2943  return attemptInfo;
2944 }

2952 {
2953  if ( value != 0 )
2954  m_canStartGoal = true;
2955  else
2956  m_canStartGoal = false;
2957 }

2959 /******************************************************************/
2960 /* */
2961 /* */
2962 /******************************************************************/
2963 
2964 void CGoalManager::CheckTrickObjects()
2965 {
2966  Mdl::Skate* skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
2967  Obj::CSkater* pSkater = skate_mod->GetLocalSkater();
2968 
2969  Mdl::Score* pScore = pSkater->GetScoreObject();
2970  int score = pScore->GetLastScoreLanded();
2971 
2972  Obj::CTrickComponent* pTrickComponent = GetTrickComponentFromObject(pSkater);
2973  Dbg_Assert(pTrickComponent);
2974 
2975  Obj::CPendingTricks pendingTricks = pTrickComponent->m_pending_tricks;
2976 
2977  int max_tricks = pendingTricks.m_NumTrickItems;
2978  if ( max_tricks > pendingTricks.vMAX_PENDING_TRICKS )
2979  max_tricks = pendingTricks.vMAX_PENDING_TRICKS;
2980 
2981  for ( int i = 0; i < max_tricks; i++ )
2982  {
2983  GotTrickObject( pendingTricks.m_Checksum[i], score );
2984  }
2985 }

2995  mp_proSpecificChallenges->AddInteger( skater_name, beaten );

3028 /******************************************************************/

3030 /* */
3031 /******************************************************************/
3032 
3033 bool CGoalManager::ShouldUseTimer()
3034 {
3035  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
3036  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
3037  {
3038  uint32 key;
3039  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
3040  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
3041 
3042  if ( pGoal->IsActive() && pGoal->ShouldUseTimer() )
3043  {
3044  return true;
3045  }
3046  }
3047  return false;
3048 }
