3063 /******************************************************************/
3064 /* */
3065 /* */
3066 /******************************************************************/
3067 
3068 void CGoalManager::Land()
3069 {
3070  if ( ShouldLogTrickObject() )
3071  CheckTrickObjects();
3072  else
3073  {
3074  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
3075  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
3076  {
3077  uint32 key;
3078  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
3079  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
3080 
3081  if ( pGoal->IsActive() && pGoal->IsHorseGoal() )
3082  {
3083  Game::CHorseGoal* pHorseGoal = (Game::CHorseGoal*)pGoal;
3084  pHorseGoal->CheckScore();
3085  break;
3086  }
3087  else if ( pGoal->IsActive() && pGoal->GetParams()->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xc63432a7,"high_combo") ) )
3088  {
3089  // TODO: maybe the high combo goal should be a subclass rather than
3090  // having a special case here?
3091  Obj::CSkater* pSkater = Mdl::Skate::Instance()->GetLocalSkater();
3092  if ( pSkater )
3093  {
3094  Mdl::Score* pScore = pSkater->GetScoreObject();
3095  if ( pScore->GetLastScoreLanded() > 0 )
3096  {
3097  Script::CStruct* pScriptParams = new Script::CStruct();
3098  pScriptParams->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x9982e501,"goal_id"), pGoal->GetGoalId() );
3099  pScriptParams->AddInteger( CRCD(0xb9072b65,"last_score_landed"), pScore->GetLastScoreLanded() );
3100  Script::RunScript( CRCD(0x6b755ed8,"goal_highcombo_check_score"), pScriptParams );
3101  delete pScriptParams;
3102  }
3103  }
3104  }
3105  else if ( pGoal->IsActive() && pGoal->ShouldRequireCombo() && pGoal->GetParams()->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x7100155d,"combo_started") ) )
3106  {
3107  // lose the goal next frame
3108  Script::CStruct* pScriptParams = new Script::CStruct();
3109  pScriptParams->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x9982e501,"goal_id"), pGoal->GetGoalId() );
3110  Script::SpawnScript( CRCD(0xfefda11,"goal_lose_next_frame"), pScriptParams );
3111  delete pScriptParams;
3112  }
3113  else if ( pGoal->IsActive() && pGoal->GetParams()->ContainsFlag( CRCD( 0x293b95a7, "score_goal" ) ) )
3114  {
3115  Obj::CSkater* pSkater = Mdl::Skate::Instance()->GetLocalSkater();
3116  if ( pSkater )
3117  {
3118  Mdl::Score* pScore = pSkater->GetScoreObject();
3119  int required_score;
3120  pGoal->GetParams()->GetInteger( CRCD(0xcd66c8ae,"score"), &required_score, Script::ASSERT );
3121  if ( pScore->GetTotalScore() + pScore->GetScorePotValue() >= required_score )
3122  {
3123  pGoal->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0x3da891b6,"winning_score"), pScore->GetTotalScore() + pScore->GetScorePotValue() );
3124  WinGoal( pGoal->GetGoalId() );
3125  pGoal->GetParams()->RemoveComponent( CRCD(0x3da891b6,"winning_score") );
3126  }
3127  }
3128  }
3129  }
3130  }
3131 }
3132 
3133 /******************************************************************/
3134 /* */
3135 /* */
3136 /******************************************************************/
3137 
3138 void CGoalManager::Bail()
3139 {
3140  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
3141  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
3142  {
3143  uint32 key;
3144  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
3145  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
3146 
3147  if ( pGoal->IsActive() && pGoal->ShouldRequireCombo() && pGoal->GetParams()->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x7100155d,"combo_started") ) )
3148  {
3149  // lose the goal next frame
3150  Script::CStruct* pScriptParams = new Script::CStruct();
3151  pScriptParams->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x9982e501,"goal_id"), pGoal->GetGoalId() );
3152  Script::SpawnScript( CRCD(0xfefda11,"goal_lose_next_frame"), pScriptParams );
3153  delete pScriptParams;
3154  }
3155  if ( pGoal->IsActive() && pGoal->IsTetrisGoal() )
3156  {
3157  int trick_flag;
3158  if ( pGoal->GetParams()->GetInteger( CRCD( 0x60b827d5, "trick_flag" ), &trick_flag, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
3159  {
3160  if ( trick_flag != 0 )
3161  {
3162  pGoal->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0x60b827d5,"trick_flag"), 0 );
3163  }
3164  }
3165  }
3166  }
3167 }
3168

3170 /******************************************************************/
3171 /* */
3172 /* */
3173 /******************************************************************/
3174 
3175 bool CGoalManager::AwardMinigameCash( uint32 goalId, int amount )
3176 {
3177  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goalId, true );
3178  if ( pGoal && pGoal->IsMinigame() )
3179  {
3180  CMinigame* pMinigame = (CMinigame*)pGoal;
3181  return pMinigame->AwardCash( amount );
3182  }
3183  return false;
3184 }

3186 /******************************************************************/
3187 /* */
3188 /* */
3189 /******************************************************************/
3190 
3191 void CGoalManager::ResetCareer()
3192 {
3193  // reset all of the goal manager's memory
3194  mp_goalFlags->Clear();
3195 
3196  m_goalPoints = 0;
3197  m_totalGoalPointsEarned = 0;
3198  m_cash = 0;
3199  m_totalCash = 0;
3200  m_numGoalsBeaten = 0;
3201  // m_proChallengesUnlocked = false;
3202  m_isPro = false;
3203 
3204  // mp_proSpecificChallenges->AppendStructure( Script::GetStructure( CRCD(0xd8b84847,"goal_pro_specific_challenges_beaten"), Script::ASSERT ) );
3205  m_currentChapter = m_currentStage = 0;
3206 
3207  mp_difficulty_levels->Clear();
3208 }
3209 
3210 /******************************************************************/
3211 /* */
3212 /* */
3213 /******************************************************************/
3214 
3215 void CGoalManager::AwardAllGoalCash()
3216 {
3217  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
3218  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
3219  {
3220  uint32 key;
3221  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
3222  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
3223 
3224  if ( !pGoal->IsMinigame() && !pGoal->HasWonGoal() )
3225  {
3226  // printf("found an unbeaten goal\n");
3227  pGoal->MarkBeaten();
3228  Script::CStruct* pRewardParams = new Script::CStruct();
3229  pGoal->GetRewardsStructure( pRewardParams );
3230  int cash;
3231  if ( pRewardParams->GetInteger( "cash", &cash, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
3232  {
3233  const char* p_goal_name;
3234  pGoal->GetParams()->GetString( CRCD(0xbfecc45b,"goal_name"), &p_goal_name, Script::ASSERT );
3235  // printf("adding $%i for goal %s\n", cash, p_goal_name);
3236  AddCash( cash );
3237  }
3238  delete pRewardParams;
3239  }
3240  }
3241 }
3242 
3243 /******************************************************************/
3244 /* */
3245 /* */
3246 /******************************************************************/
3247 
3248 void CGoalManager::UpdateFamilyTrees()
3249 {
3250  int numGoals = GetNumGoals();
3251 
3252  // update all the parent lists
3253  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
3254  {
3255  uint32 key;
3256  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
3257  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
3258  uint32 parent_id = pGoal->GetGoalId();
3259  Game::CGoalLink* p_child = pGoal->GetChildren();
3260 
3261  while ( p_child && p_child->m_relative != 0 )
3262  {
3263  // printf("goal has a child\n");
3264  uint32 child_id = p_child->m_relative;
3265  // get the child
3266  CGoal* pChildGoal = GetGoal( child_id, false );
3267  Dbg_MsgAssert( pChildGoal, ( "Failed to find goal %s when binding child to parent\n", Script::FindChecksumName( child_id ) ) );
3268 
3269  // search the parent list and add if necessary
3270  Game::CGoalLink* p_parentNode = pChildGoal->GetParents();
3271  bool found = false;
3272  while ( p_parentNode && p_parentNode->m_relative != 0 )
3273  {
3274  if ( p_parentNode->m_relative == parent_id )
3275  {
3276  found = true;
3277  break;
3278  }
3279  p_parentNode = p_parentNode->mp_next;
3280  }
3281 
3282  if ( !found )
3283  pChildGoal->AddParent( parent_id );
3284 
3285  p_child = p_child->mp_next;
3286  }
3287  }
3288 
3289  // send inherited params down the tree from root parent
3290  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
3291  {
3292  uint32 key;
3293  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
3294  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
3295 
3296  // SetInheritableFlags will automatically traverse down the tree,
3297  // so we only need to call it on nodes without parents - ie, the root
3298  // node of the tree.
3299  if ( pGoal->GetParents()->m_relative == 0 )
3300  {
3301  pGoal->SetInheritableFlags();
3302  }
3303  }
3304 
3305  // debugging shit.
3306  for ( int i = 0; i < numGoals; i++ )
3307  {
3308  uint32 key;
3309  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
3310  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
3311 
3312  // print out children list
3313  Game::CGoalLink* p_test = pGoal->GetChildren();
3314  bool print_newline = false;
3315  if ( p_test->m_relative != 0 )
3316  // printf("children of %s\n", Script::FindChecksumName( pGoal->GetGoalId() ) );
3317  while ( p_test && p_test->m_relative != 0 )
3318  {
3319  print_newline = true;
3320  // printf("\t%s\n", Script::FindChecksumName( p_test->m_relative ) );
3321  p_test = p_test->mp_next;
3322  }
3323 
3324  // print out the parent list
3325  p_test = pGoal->GetParents();
3326  if ( p_test->m_relative != 0 )
3327  // printf("parents of %s\n", Script::FindChecksumName( pGoal->GetGoalId() ) );
3328  while ( p_test && p_test->m_relative != 0 )
3329  {
3330  print_newline = true;
3331  // printf("\t%s\n", Script::FindChecksumName( p_test->m_relative ) );
3332  p_test = p_test->mp_next;
3333  }
3334  // if ( print_newline )
3335  // printf("\n");
3336  }
3337 }
3338 
3339 /******************************************************************/
3340 /* */
3341 /* */
3342 /******************************************************************/
3343 
3344 void CGoalManager::FindCircularLinks( uint32 parent, uint32 child )
3345 {
3346 #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
3347  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( child, false );
3348  if ( pGoal )
3349  {
3350  CGoalLink* p_link = pGoal->GetChildren();
3351  while ( p_link && p_link->m_relative != 0 )
3352  {
3353  if ( p_link->m_relative == parent )
3354  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "Circular goal link path found from %s to %s\n", Script::FindChecksumName( parent ), Script::FindChecksumName( child ) ) );
3355  if ( p_link->m_relative == child )
3356  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "Goal (%s) has itself as a child\n", Script::FindChecksumName( child ) ) );
3357 
3358  // recurse!
3359  FindCircularLinks( parent, p_link->m_relative );
3360  p_link = p_link->mp_next;
3361  }
3362  }
3363 #endif
3364 }
3365 
3366 /******************************************************************/
3367 /* */
3368 /* */
3369 /******************************************************************/
3370 
3371 bool CGoalManager::CallMemberFunction( uint32 checksum, Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
3372 {
3373  switch ( checksum )
3374  {
3375  case 0x3ae9211b: // IsRootNode
3376  {
3377  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( pParams );
3378  if ( pGoal )
3379  return ( pGoal->GetParents()->m_relative == 0 );
3380  return false;
3381  break;
3382  }
3383 
3384  case 0xd782f8de: // IsLeafNode
3385  {
3386  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( pParams );
3387  if ( pGoal )
3388  return ( pGoal->GetChildren()->m_relative == 0 );
3389  return false;
3390  break;
3391  }
3392  }
3393  return false;
3394 }
3395 
3396 /******************************************************************/
3397 /* */
3398 /* */
3399 /******************************************************************/
3400 
3401 uint32 CGoalManager::GetGoalIdFromParams( Script::CStruct* pParams, bool assert )
3402 {
3403  uint32 goalId = 0;
3404  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, assert );
3405  return goalId;
3406 }
3407 
3408 /******************************************************************/
3409 /* */
3410 /* */
3411 /******************************************************************/
3412 
3413 void CGoalManager::CreateGoalLevelObjects( void )
3414 {
3415  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
3416  {
3417  Script::CStruct* pParams;
3418  Script::CArray *pGeomArray;
3419  uint32 key;
3420  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
3421  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
3422  pParams = pGoal->GetParams();
3423 
3424  // Create the associated pieces of geometry
3425  if ( pParams->GetArray( CRCD(0xf4eb5c60,"create_geometry"), &pGeomArray ) )
3426  {
3427  uint32 j, geometry;
3428  for( j = 0; j < pGeomArray->GetSize(); j++ )
3429  {
3430  geometry = pGeomArray->GetChecksum( j );
3431  CFuncs::ScriptCreateFromNodeIndex( SkateScript::FindNamedNode( geometry ));
3432  }
3433  }
3434  }
3435 }
3436 
3437 /******************************************************************/
3438 /* */
3439 /* */
3440 /******************************************************************/
3441 
3442 void CGoalManager::SetDifficultyLevel( int level )
3443 {
3444  Dbg_MsgAssert( level >= 0 && level <= vMAXDIFFICULTYLEVEL, ( "SetDifficultyLevel called with level %i", level ) );
3445  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
3446  uint32 gameMode = skate_mod->GetGameMode()->GetNameChecksum();
3447  mp_difficulty_levels->AddInteger( gameMode, level );
3448 }
3449 
3450 /******************************************************************/
3451 /* */
3452 /* */
3453 /******************************************************************/
3454 
3455 GOAL_MANAGER_DIFFICULTY_LEVEL CGoalManager::GetDifficultyLevel( bool career )
3456 {
3457  uint32 gameMode;
3458  if ( career)
3459  {
3460  gameMode = CRCD(0x4da4937b,"career");
3461  }
3462  else
3463  {
3464  Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
3465  gameMode = skate_mod->GetGameMode()->GetNameChecksum();
3466  }
3467 
3468  int level;
3469 
3470  // if no diff level assigned for this game mode yet, assume normal
3471  if ( !mp_difficulty_levels->GetInteger( gameMode, &level, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
3472  level = 1;
3473 
3474  GOAL_MANAGER_DIFFICULTY_LEVEL diff_level = GOAL_MANAGER_DIFFICULTY_MEDIUM;
3475 
3476  switch ( level )
3477  {
3478  case 0:
3479  diff_level = GOAL_MANAGER_DIFFICULTY_LOW;
3480  break;
3481  case 1:
3482  diff_level = GOAL_MANAGER_DIFFICULTY_MEDIUM;
3483  break;
3484  case 2:
3485  diff_level = GOAL_MANAGER_DIFFICULTY_HIGH;
3486  break;
3487  default:
3488  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "bad difficulty level %i", level ) );
3489  break;
3490  }
3491 
3492  return diff_level;
3493 }
3494 
3495 
3496 /******************************************************************/
3497 /* */
3498 /* */
3499 /******************************************************************/
3500 
3501 bool CGoalManager::CanRestartStage()
3502 {
3503  printf("STUBBED\n");
3504  return false;
3505 /*
3506  int activeGoal = GetActiveGoal();
3507  if ( activeGoal != -1 )
3508  {
3509  uint32 key;
3510  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( activeGoal, (int*)&key );
3511  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
3512 
3513  if ( pGoal->m_inherited_flags & GOAL_INHERITED_FLAGS_RETRY_STAGE )
3514  {
3515  return true;
3516  }
3517  }
3518  return false;
3519 */
3520 }
3521 
3522 /******************************************************************/
3523 /* */
3524 /* */
3525 /******************************************************************/
3526 
3527 void CGoalManager::SetGoalChaptersAndStages()
3528 {
3529  // grab the chapter info array
3530  Script::CArray* pChapterGoalsArray = Script::GetArray( CRCD( 0xb892776f, "chapter_goals" ), Script::ASSERT );
3531  Dbg_Assert( pChapterGoalsArray->GetType() == ESYMBOLTYPE_ARRAY );
3532 
3533  int chapter_goals_array_size = pChapterGoalsArray->GetSize();
3534  for ( int chapter_index = 0; chapter_index < chapter_goals_array_size; chapter_index++ )
3535  {
3536  Script::CArray* pStageArray = pChapterGoalsArray->GetArray( chapter_index );
3537  Dbg_Assert( pStageArray->GetType() == ESYMBOLTYPE_ARRAY );
3538  int stage_array_size = pStageArray->GetSize();
3539  for ( int stage_index = 0; stage_index < stage_array_size; stage_index++ )
3540  {
3541  Script::CArray* pStage = pStageArray->GetArray( stage_index );
3542  Dbg_Assert( pStage->GetType() == ESYMBOLTYPE_STRUCTURE );
3543  int num_goals = pStage->GetSize();
3544  for ( int goal_index = 0; goal_index < num_goals; goal_index++ )
3545  {
3546  Script::CStruct* pGoalStruct = pStage->GetStructure( goal_index );
3547  uint32 goal_id;
3548  if ( pGoalStruct->GetChecksum( CRCD( 0x9982e501, "goal_id" ), &goal_id, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
3549  {
3550  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goal_id, false );
3551  if ( pGoal )
3552  {
3553  pGoal->SetChapter( chapter_index );
3554  pGoal->SetStage( stage_index );
3555  }
3556  }
3557  }
3558  }
3559  }
3560 }
3561 
3562 
3563 /******************************************************************/
3564 /* */
3565 /* */
3566 /******************************************************************/
3567 
3568 bool CGoalManager::AdvanceStage( bool force, uint32 just_won_goal_id )
3569 {
3570  // printf("CGoalManager::AdvanceStage\n");
3571  // DeactivateAllGoals();
3572 
3573  // K: This was to fix an assert when winning a created goal in the park editor.
3574  // Fixed by just not doing any advance-stage logic when in created goals mode.
3575  Mdl::Skate *p_skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
3576  if ( p_skate_mod->GetGameMode()->IsTrue( CRCD( 0x353961d7, "is_creategoals" ) ) )
3577  {
3578  return false;
3579  }
3580 
3581  // grab the chapter info array
3582  Script::CArray* pChapterGoalsArray = Script::GetArray( CRCD( 0xb892776f, "chapter_goals" ), Script::ASSERT );
3583  Dbg_Assert( pChapterGoalsArray->GetType() == ESYMBOLTYPE_ARRAY );
3584 
3585  // grab num goals to complete array
3586  Script::CArray* pChapterNumGoalsToComplete = Script::GetArray( CRCD( 0x846f65f5, "CHAPTER_NUM_GOALS_TO_COMPLETE" ), Script::ASSERT );
3587  Dbg_Assert( pChapterNumGoalsToComplete->GetType() == ESYMBOLTYPE_ARRAY );
3588 
3589  if ( m_currentChapter >= (int)pChapterGoalsArray->GetSize() )
3590  {
3591  // they beat the game
3592  return false;
3593  }
3594  // printf("m_currentChapter = %i, m_currentStage = %i\n", m_currentChapter, m_currentStage);
3595  Dbg_MsgAssert( m_currentChapter < (int)pChapterGoalsArray->GetSize(), ( "the current chapter is %i, but the chapter goals array has size %i.", m_currentChapter, pChapterGoalsArray->GetSize() ) );
3596  Script::CArray* pCurrentChapter = pChapterGoalsArray->GetArray( m_currentChapter );
3597  Dbg_MsgAssert( m_currentStage < (int)pCurrentChapter->GetSize(), ( "The current stage is set to %i, but the chapter array only has %i stage(s).", m_currentStage, pCurrentChapter->GetSize() ) );
3598  Script::CArray* pCurrentStage = pCurrentChapter->GetArray( m_currentStage );
3599 
3600  Script::CArray* pChapterTotals = pChapterNumGoalsToComplete->GetArray( m_currentChapter );
3601  int stage_total_target = pChapterTotals->GetInteger( m_currentStage );
3602  int num_stages = pChapterTotals->GetSize();
3603 
3604  // resolve just won goal to parent goal, which is what's listed
3605  // in the chapter info array
3606  if ( just_won_goal_id )
3607  {
3608  // printf("just won goal %s\n", Script::FindChecksumName( just_won_goal_id ) );
3609  CGoal* pJustWonGoal = GetGoal( just_won_goal_id );
3610  CGoalLink* pJustWonParents = pJustWonGoal->GetParents();
3611  while ( pJustWonParents && pJustWonParents->m_relative != 0 )
3612  {
3613  just_won_goal_id = pJustWonParents->m_relative;
3614  pJustWonGoal = GetGoal( pJustWonParents->m_relative );
3615  pJustWonParents = pJustWonGoal->GetParents();
3616  }
3617  }
3618 
3619  // check the required total
3620  int num_goals = pCurrentStage->GetSize();
3621  int stage_total = 0;
3622 
3623  for ( int goal_index = 0; goal_index < num_goals; goal_index++ )
3624  {
3625  Script::CStruct* pGoalStruct = pCurrentStage->GetStructure( goal_index );
3626  uint32 goal_id;
3627  if ( pGoalStruct->GetChecksum( CRCD( 0x9982e501, "goal_id" ), &goal_id, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
3628  {
3629  CGoal* pGoal = GetGoal( goal_id, false );
3630 
3631  if ( pGoal )
3632  {
3633  // resolve to parent goal id
3634  CGoalLink* pParents = pGoal->GetParents();
3635  while ( pParents && pParents->m_relative != 0 )
3636  {
3637  goal_id = pParents->m_relative;
3638  pGoal = GetGoal( pParents->m_relative );
3639  pParents = pGoal->GetParents();
3640  }
3641  }
3642 
3643  if ( pGoal )
3644  {
3645  if ( ( goal_id == just_won_goal_id && !pGoal->HasWonGoal() ) || ( pGoal->HasWonGoal() ) )
3646  {
3647  stage_total++;
3648  // printf( "you've won %s, stage_total = %i\n", Script::FindChecksumName( goal_id ), stage_total );
3649  }
3650  }
3651  else
3652  {
3653  // look for goal in other level
3654  Script::CStruct* pTempGoalParams;
3655  if ( mp_goalFlags->GetStructure( goal_id, &pTempGoalParams, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
3656  {
3657  int hasBeaten = 0;
3658  pTempGoalParams->GetInteger( "hasBeaten", &hasBeaten, Script::ASSERT );
3659  if ( hasBeaten != 0 )
3660  {
3661  // printf("you've beaten %s in another level\n", Script::FindChecksumName( p_comp->mNameChecksum ) );
3662  stage_total++;
3663  }
3664  }
3665  }
3666  }
3667  }
3668 
3669  // printf("stage_total = %i, stage_total_target = %i\n", stage_total, stage_total_target );
3670  if ( stage_total >= stage_total_target || force )
3671  {
3672  // we've beaten the stage
3673  if ( m_currentStage + 1 == num_stages )
3674  {
3675  // we've finished the chapter
3676  m_currentChapter++;
3677  m_currentStage = 0;
3678  }
3679  else
3680  {
3681  m_currentStage++;
3682  }
3683 
3684  // printf("m_currentStage = %i\n", m_currentStage);
3685  // reinitialize the chapter and stage
3686  UninitializeAllGoals();
3687  InitializeAllGoals();
3688 
3689  return true;
3690  }
3691  return false;
3692 }
3693 
3694 /******************************************************************/
3695 /* */
3696 /* */
3697 /******************************************************************/
3698 
3699 void CGoalManager::RunLastStageScript()
3700 {
3701  // DeactivateAllGoals();
3702 
3703  // don't do anything if they beat the game
3704  Script::CArray* pChapterGoalsArray = Script::GetArray( CRCD( 0xb892776f, "chapter_goals" ), Script::ASSERT );
3705  Dbg_Assert( pChapterGoalsArray->GetType() == ESYMBOLTYPE_ARRAY );
3706  if ( m_currentChapter >= (int)pChapterGoalsArray->GetSize() )
3707  {
3708  return;
3709  }
3710 
3711  // K: This was to fix an assert when winning a created goal in the park editor.
3712  // Fixed by just not doing any advance-stage logic when in created goals mode.
3713  Mdl::Skate *p_skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
3714  if ( p_skate_mod->GetGameMode()->IsTrue( CRCD( 0x353961d7, "is_creategoals" ) ) )
3715  {
3716  return;
3717  }
3718 
3719  // grab the chapter scripts arrray
3720  Script::CArray* pChapterScriptsArray = Script::GetArray( CRCD(0x9f00892d,"CHAPTER_COMPLETION_SCRIPTS"), Script::ASSERT );
3721  Dbg_Assert( pChapterScriptsArray->GetType() == ESYMBOLTYPE_ARRAY );
3722 
3723  int last_stage_index = m_currentStage;
3724  int last_chapter_index = m_currentChapter;
3725 
3726  if ( last_stage_index == 0 )
3727  {
3728  if ( last_chapter_index == 0 )
3729  {
3730  // we're on the first chapter and stage - don't do anything
3731  return;
3732  }
3733  last_chapter_index--;
3734 
3735  Dbg_MsgAssert( last_chapter_index < (int)pChapterScriptsArray->GetSize(), ( "last_chapter_index %i too big", last_chapter_index ) );
3736 
3737  // figure the stage index
3738  Script::CArray* pChapterArray = pChapterScriptsArray->GetArray( last_chapter_index );
3739  Dbg_Assert( pChapterArray );
3740  last_stage_index = pChapterArray->GetSize() - 1;
3741  // [ { script_name=NJ_StageSwitch_0_to_1_1 }, { script_name=NJ_StageSwitch_1_1_to_1_2 }, { script_name=NJ_StageSwitch_1_2_to_2_1 } ]
3742  }
3743  else
3744  last_stage_index--;
3745 
3746  uint32 script_name;
3747  Script::CArray* pChapterParamsArray = pChapterScriptsArray->GetArray( last_chapter_index );
3748  Dbg_Assert( pChapterParamsArray );
3749  Script::CStruct* pStageScriptStruct = pChapterParamsArray->GetStructure( last_stage_index );
3750  Dbg_Assert( pStageScriptStruct );
3751  if ( pStageScriptStruct->GetChecksum( CRCD(0x6166f3ad,"script_name"), &script_name, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
3752  {
3753  Script::SpawnScript( script_name );
3754  }
3755 }
3756 
3757 /******************************************************************/
3758 /* */
3759 /* */
3760 /******************************************************************/
3761 
3762 void CGoalManager::SetTeamMember( uint32 pro, bool remove, bool mark_used )
3763 {
3764  if ( remove )
3765  mp_team->RemoveComponent( pro );
3766  else
3767  {
3768  if ( mark_used )
3769  mp_team->AddInteger( pro, 1 );
3770  else
3771  mp_team->AddInteger( pro, 0 );
3772  }
3773 }
3774 
3775 /******************************************************************/
3776 /* */
3777 /* */
3778 /******************************************************************/
3779 
3780 void CGoalManager::KillTeamMembers( )
3781 {
3782  mp_team->Clear();
3783 }

3791 {

3793 }

3796 /* */
3797 /* */
3798 /******************************************************************/
3799 
3800 void CGoalManager::HideAllGoalPeds( bool hide )
3801 {
3802  for ( int i = 0; i < GetNumGoals(); i++ )
3803  {
3804  uint32 key;
3805  CGoal* pGoal = m_goalList.GetItemByIndex( i, (int*)&key );
3806  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
3807  pGoal->mp_goalPed->Hide( hide );
3808  }
3809 }

3817 {

3819  return skate_mod->GetGoalManager();
3820 }

3827 // @script | GoalManager_AddGoal |
3828 // @parm name | name | the goal id
3829 // @parm structure | params | goal parameters
3830 bool ScriptAddGoal(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
3831 {
3832  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
3833  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
3834 
3835  uint32 goalId;
3836  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
3837 
3838  Script::CStruct* pSubParams;
3839  pParams->GetStructure( CRCD(0x7031f10c,"params"), &pSubParams, Script::ASSERT );
3840 
3841  return pGoalManager->AddGoal( goalId, pSubParams );
3842 }

3858  pGoalManager->RemoveGoal( goalId );
3859 
3860  return true;
3861 }

3927 // @flag dontAssert | pass this in if you don't want the goal manager
3928 // to assert if it can't find the specified goal (not recommended)
3929 bool ScriptActivateGoal(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)

3938  bool dontAssert = false;
3939  if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x9ac8d54f,"dontAssert") ) )
3940  dontAssert = true;
3941 
3942  return pGoalManager->ActivateGoal( goalId, dontAssert );

3977 /******************************************************************/
3978 /* */
3979 /* */
3980 /******************************************************************/
3981 
3982 // @script | GoalManager_WinGoal |
3983 // @parm name | name | the goal id
3984 bool ScriptWinGoal(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
3985 {
3986  #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
3987  bool had_object = false;
3988  uint32 old_id = 0;
3989  Obj::CObjectPtr p_obj;
3990  if (pScript->mpObject)
3991  {
3992  had_object = true;
3993  p_obj = pScript->mpObject;
3994  old_id = p_obj->GetID();
3995  }
3996  #endif
3997 
3998 
3999  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4000  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4001 
4002  uint32 goalId;
4003  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
4004  bool result = pGoalManager->WinGoal( goalId );
4005 
4006  #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
4007  if (had_object)
4008  {
4009  Dbg_MsgAssert(p_obj,("%s\nObject %s was deleted indirectly \nWhen running a script via GoalManager_WinGoal\n You probably use KILL PREFIX = ...., Maybe you could use DIE instead",pScript->GetScriptInfo(),Script::FindChecksumName(old_id)));
4010  }
4011  #endif
4012 
4013  return result;
4014 }
4015 
4016 /******************************************************************/
4017 /* */
4018 /* */
4019 /******************************************************************/
4020 
4021 // @script | GoalManager_LoseGoal |
4022 // @parm name | name | the goal id
4023 bool ScriptLoseGoal(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4024 {
4025 
4026  #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
4027  bool had_object = false;
4028  uint32 old_id = 0;
4029  Obj::CObjectPtr p_obj;
4030  if (pScript->mpObject)
4031  {
4032  had_object = true;
4033  p_obj = pScript->mpObject;
4034  old_id = p_obj->GetID();
4035  }
4036  #endif
4037 
4038  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4039  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4040 
4041  uint32 goalId;
4042  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
4043  bool result = pGoalManager->LoseGoal( goalId );
4044 
4045  #ifdef __NOPT_ASSERT__
4046  if (had_object)
4047  {
4048  Dbg_MsgAssert(p_obj,("%s\nObject %s was deleted indirectly when running a script via GoalManager_LoseGoal\n You probaly use KILL PREFIX = ...., Maybe you could use DIE instead",pScript->GetScriptInfo(),Script::FindChecksumName(old_id)));
4049  }
4050  #endif
4051 
4052 
4053  return result;
4054 
4055 }
4056 
4057 /******************************************************************/
4058 /* */
4059 /* */
4060 /******************************************************************/
4061 
4062 // @script | GoalManager_RemoveAllGoals | this will completely destroy
4063 // all the goals currently in existence...make sure you call GoalManager_LevelUnload
4064 // first if you want to remember anything about the state of the goals before
4065 // destroying them.
4066 bool ScriptRemoveAllGoals(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4067 {
4068  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4069  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4070  pGoalManager->RemoveAllGoals();
4071 
4072  return true;
4073 }
4074 
4075 /******************************************************************/
4076 /* */
4077 /* */
4078 /******************************************************************/
4079 
4080 // @script | GoalManager_DeactivateAllGoals |
4081 bool ScriptDeactivateAllGoals(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4082 {
4083  bool including_net_goals;
4084  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4085  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4086 
4087  including_net_goals = false;
4088  if( pParams->ContainsComponentNamed( CRCD(0xcc365298,"force_all")))
4089  {
4090  including_net_goals = true;
4091  }
4092 
4093  pGoalManager->DeactivateAllGoals( including_net_goals );
4094 
4095  return true;
4096 }
4097 
4098 /******************************************************************/
4099 /* */
4100 /* */
4101 /******************************************************************/
4102 
4103 // @script | UninitializeAllGoals |
4104 bool ScriptUninitializeAllGoals(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4105 {
4106  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4107  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4108  pGoalManager->UninitializeAllGoals();
4109 
4110  return true;
4111 }
4112 
4113 /******************************************************************/
4114 /* */
4115 /* */
4116 /******************************************************************/
4117 
4118 // @script | GoalManager_UninitializeGoal |
4119 // @parm name | name | the goal id
4120 bool ScriptUninitializeGoal(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4121 {
4122  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4123  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4124  uint32 goalId;
4125  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
4126  if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x687de558,"affect_tree") ) )
4127  {
4128  pGoalManager->UninitializeGoalTree( goalId );
4129  }
4130  else
4131  {
4132  pGoalManager->UninitializeGoal( goalId );
4133  }
4134  return true;
4135 }
4136

4138 /* */
4139 /* */
4140 /******************************************************************/
4141

4143 bool ScriptInitializeAllGoals(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4144 {
4145  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4146  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4147  pGoalManager->InitializeAllGoals();
4148 
4149  return true;
4150 }

4172 // @script | GoalManager_UpdateAllGoals | This forces the goal manager to run
4173 // an update cycle.
4174 bool ScriptUpdateAllGoals(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4175 {
4176  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4177  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4178  pGoalManager->Update();
4179 
4180  return true;
4181 }

4183 /******************************************************************/
4184 /* */
4185 /* */
4186 /******************************************************************/
4187 
4188 // @script | GoalManager_HasActiveGoals | returns true if there is at least one
4189 // active goal (excluding minigames and other goals that don't count towards the total)
4190 bool ScriptHasActiveGoals(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4191 {
4192  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4193  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4194 
4195  bool count_all = pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xa21884b5,"count_all") );
4196 
4197  return ( pGoalManager->GetNumActiveGoals( count_all ) > 0 );
4198 }
4199

4202 /* */
4203 /******************************************************************/

4205 // @script | GoalManager_GoalIsActive | returns true if the specified goal
4206 // is currently active
4207 // @parm name | name | the goal id
4208 bool ScriptGoalIsActive(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4209 {
4210  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4211  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4212 
4213  uint32 goalId;
4214  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
4215  return pGoalManager->GoalIsActive( goalId );
4216 }

4233

4251 
4252  return pGoalManager->SetGoalTimer( goalId, 0 );
4253 }

4290 /******************************************************************/
4291 
4292 // @script | GoalManager_SetGoalFlag | for setting the special goal flags
4293 // @parm name | name | the goal id
4294 // @uparm name | the name of the flag to set
4295 // @uparm 1 | value to use
4296 bool ScriptSetGoalFlag(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4297 {
4298  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4299  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4300 
4301  uint32 goalId;
4302  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
4303 
4304  uint32 flagChecksum;
4305  pParams->GetChecksum( NONAME, &flagChecksum, Script::ASSERT );
4306 
4307  int flagValue;
4308  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &flagValue, Script::ASSERT );
4309 
4310  bool success = pGoalManager->SetGoalFlag( goalId, flagChecksum, flagValue );
4311 
4312  return success;
4313 }

4331 
4332  return ( pGoalManager->HasSeenGoal( goalId ) );
4333 }

4439 // @script | GoalManager_GetGoalParams | this will append the goal's
4440 // params onto the scripts params. The goal manager scripts use this
4441 // extensively to avoid passing large structures back and forth.
4442 // @parm name | name | the goal id
4443 bool ScriptGetGoalParams(Script::CStruct *pParams, Script::CScript *pScript)
4444 {
4445  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4446  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4447 
4448  uint32 goalId;
4449  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
4450 
4451  pScript->GetParams()->AppendStructure( pGoalManager->GetGoalParams( goalId ) );
4452 
4453  return true;
4454 }

4530 
4531 /******************************************************************/
4532 /* */
4533 /* */
4534 /******************************************************************/
4535 
4536 // @script | GoalManager_CreateGoalName |
4537 // @parm string | goal_type | the goal type
4538 bool ScriptCreateGoalName( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
4539 {
4540  char goal_prefix[128];
4541  const char* goal_type;
4542 
4543  pParams->GetText( CRCD(0x6d11ed74,"goal_type"), &goal_type, Script::ASSERT );
4544 
4545  // Mdl::Skate * skate_mod = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
4546  // Obj::CSkaterCareer* pCareer = skate_mod->GetCareer();
4547 
4548  // create the level prefix
4549  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4550  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4551  Script::CStruct* p_level_structure = Script::GetStructure( pGoalManager->GetLevelStructureName(), Script::ASSERT );
4552  const char* p_level_prefix;
4553  p_level_structure->GetString( CRCD(0x651533ec,"level"), &p_level_prefix, Script::ASSERT );
4554  strcpy( goal_prefix, p_level_prefix );
4555  strcat( goal_prefix, "_goal_" );
4556 
4557 /* // figure the level
4558  switch ( level )
4559  {
4560  case 1: // school
4561  strcpy( goal_prefix, "Sch_goal_" );
4562  break;
4563  case 2: // san francisco
4564  strcpy( goal_prefix, "Sf2_goal_" );
4565  break;
4566  case 3: // alcatraz
4567  strcpy( goal_prefix, "Alc_goal_" );
4568  break;
4569  case 4: // Kona park
4570  strcpy( goal_prefix, "Kon_goal_" );
4571  break;
4572  case 5: // junkyard
4573  strcpy( goal_prefix, "Jnk_goal_" );
4574  break;
4575  case 6: // london
4576  strcpy( goal_prefix, "Lon_goal_" );
4577  break;
4578  case 7: // zoo
4579  strcpy( goal_prefix, "Zoo_goal_" );
4580  break;
4581  case 8: // carnival
4582  strcpy( goal_prefix, "Cnv_Goal_" );
4583  break;
4584  case 9: // chicago
4585  strcpy( goal_prefix, "Hof_goal_" );
4586  break;
4587  case 10: // default test level
4588  strcpy( goal_prefix, "Default_goal_" );
4589  break;
4590  default:
4591  Dbg_MsgAssert( false, ( "GetGoalName couldn't figure level number" ) );
4592  }
4593 */
4594 
4595  // create the goal name
4596  strcat( goal_prefix, (char*)goal_type );
4597 
4598  // add to pParams
4599  pScript->GetParams()->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x9982e501,"goal_id"), Script::GenerateCRC( goal_prefix ) );
4600  pScript->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0xbfecc45b,"goal_name"), goal_prefix );
4601 
4602  return true;
4603 }
4604 
4605 /******************************************************************/
4606 /* */
4607 /* */
4608 /******************************************************************/
4609 
4610 // @script | GoalManager_GetLevelPrefix | returns the current level's prefix in level_prefix
4611 bool ScriptGetLevelPrefix( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
4612 {
4613  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4614  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4615  Script::CStruct* p_level_structure = Script::GetStructure( pGoalManager->GetLevelStructureName(), Script::ASSERT );
4616  const char* p_level_prefix;
4617  p_level_structure->GetString( CRCD(0x651533ec,"level"), &p_level_prefix, Script::ASSERT );
4618 
4619  pScript->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0x15f818d0,"level_prefix"), p_level_prefix);
4620 
4621  return true;
4622 }

4711 
4712 // @script | GoalManager_GotCounterObject |
4713 // @parm name | name | the goal id
4714 bool ScriptGotCounterObject( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
4715 {
4716  uint32 goalId;
4717  if ( pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
4718  {
4719  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4720  pGoalManager->GotCounterObject( goalId );
4721  return true;
4722  }
4723  else
4724  {
4725  // printf("didn't get goalId\n");
4726  }
4727  return false;
4728 }

4754 // @script | GoalManager_AddGoalPoint | adds one goal point
4755 bool ScriptAddGoalPoint(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
4756 {

4763 /******************************************************************/
4764 /* */
4765 /* */
4766 /******************************************************************/
4767 
4768 // @script | GoalManager_SpendGoalPoints |
4769 // @uparm 1 | number to spend
4770 bool ScriptSpendGoalPoints(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
4771 {
4772  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4773  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4774 
4775  int num;
4776  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &num, Script::ASSERT );
4777 
4778  pGoalManager->SpendGoalPoints( num );
4779  return true;
4780 }
4781 
4782 /******************************************************************/
4783 /* */
4784 /* */
4785 /******************************************************************/
4786 
4787 // @script | GoalManager_HasGoalPoints |
4788 // @uparm 1 | number to check for
4789 bool ScriptHasGoalPoints(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
4790 {
4791  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4792  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4793 
4794  int num;
4795  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &num, Script::ASSERT );
4796 
4797  return pGoalManager->HasGoalPoints( num );
4798 }

4801 /* */
4802 /* */
4803 /******************************************************************/
4804

4806 {
4807  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();

4809

4811

4813 }
4814 
4815 /******************************************************************/
4816 /* */
4817 /* */
4818 /******************************************************************/
4819 
4820 // @script | GoalManager_GetNumberOfGoalPoints | places the number of
4821 // goal points in a variable named "goal_points" in the script params
4822 bool ScriptGetNumberOfGoalPoints(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
4823 {
4824  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4825  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4826 
4827  int goal_points = 0;
4828  if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x3dd01ea1,"total") ) )
4829  goal_points = pGoalManager->GetTotalNumberOfGoalPointsEarned();
4830  else
4831  goal_points = pGoalManager->GetNumberOfGoalPoints();
4832 
4833  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0x42c20492,"goal_points"), goal_points );
4834  return true;
4835 }

4879 /******************************************************************/
4880 
4881 // @script | GoalManager_GetCash | places the current player's cash amount
4882 // in a parameter called "cash" in the script params
4883 bool ScriptGetCash(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
4884 {
4885  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4886  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4887 
4888  bool get_total = pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x3dd01ea1,"total") );
4889 
4890  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0xf9461a46,"cash"), pGoalManager->GetCash( get_total ) );
4891  return true;
4892 }

4897 /* */
4898 /******************************************************************/
4899 
4900 // @script | GoalManager_HasWonGoalWithProset |
4901 // @uparm "string" | the proset_prefix you wanna check
4902 bool ScriptHasBeatenGoalWithProset(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
4903 {
4904  const char* p_proset_prefix;
4905  pParams->GetString( NONAME, &p_proset_prefix, Script::ASSERT );
4906 
4907  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4908  return pGoalManager->HasBeatenGoalWithProset( p_proset_prefix );
4909 }
4910 
4911 /******************************************************************/
4912 /* */
4913 /* */
4914 /******************************************************************/
4915 
4916 // @script | GoalManager_GetProsetNotPrefix |
4917 // @uparm "string" | the proset_prefix you wanna check
4918 bool ScriptGetProsetNotPrefix(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
4919 {
4920  const char* p_proset_prefix;
4921  pParams->GetString( NONAME, &p_proset_prefix, Script::ASSERT );
4922 
4923  char temp_string[128];
4924  strcpy( temp_string, "");
4925 
4926  int size = 0;
4927  while ( p_proset_prefix[size + 1] )
4928  {
4929  temp_string[size] = p_proset_prefix[size];
4930  size++;
4931  }
4932  temp_string[size] = '\0';
4933 
4934  // now we're at the last char
4935  strcat( temp_string, "NOT_" );
4936 
4937  pScript->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0xc60ce720,"proset_not_prefix"), temp_string );
4938  return true;
4939 }
4940 
4941 
4942 /******************************************************************/
4943 /* */
4944 /* */

4950 {
4951  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4952  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4953 
4954  pGoalManager->LevelLoad();
4955  return true;
4956 }

4976 /******************************************************************/
4977 /* */
4978 /* */
4979 /******************************************************************/
4980 
4981 // @script | GoalManager_NumGoalsBeatenInLevel | This will return the number
4982 // of beaten goals in the scripts params as num_beaten
4983 // @uparm 1 | level number
4984 // @flag count_pro_specific_challenges | false by default
4985 bool ScriptNumGoalsBeatenInLevel(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
4986 {
4987  int levelNum;
4988  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &levelNum, Script::ASSERT );
4989 
4990  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
4991  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
4992 
4993  int numbeat = pGoalManager->NumGoalsBeatenInLevel( levelNum, pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x8690a9cf,"count_pro_specific_challenges") ) );
4994  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0x8110dcdf,"num_beaten"), numbeat );
4995  return true;
4996 }

5019 // @script | GoalManager_CheckMinigameRecord | checks the current minigame
5020 // value against the one stored in minigame_record in the goal params
5021 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5022 // @uparm 100 | the value you want to check against the current record
5023 bool ScriptCheckMinigameRecord(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5024 {
5025  uint32 goalId;
5026  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5027 
5028  int value;
5029  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &value, Script::ASSERT );
5030 
5031  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5032  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5033 
5034  return pGoalManager->CheckMinigameRecord( goalId, value );
5035 }

5409 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5410 bool ScriptGoalIsLocked( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
5411 {

5413  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );

5422 /******************************************************************/
5423 /* */
5424 /* */
5425 /******************************************************************/
5426 
5427 // @script | GoalManager_IsInCompetition | returns true if the player is
5428 // in a competition
5429 bool ScriptIsInCompetition( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
5430 {
5431  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5432  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5433 
5434  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->IsInCompetition();
5435  if ( pGoal )
5436  {
5437  pScript->GetParams()->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x9982e501,"goal_id"), pGoal->GetGoalId() );
5438  return true;
5439  }
5440  return false;
5441 }
5442 
5443 
5444 /******************************************************************/
5445 /* */
5446 /* */
5447 /******************************************************************/
5448 
5449 // @script | GoalManager_GetGoalAnimations | Gets the appropriate animations
5450 // array from script. It wil first search for an array specific to this goal and
5451 // type, then for an array specific to this pro, then for the generic array
5452 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5453 // @parmopt string | type | | the goal state - wait, start, midgoal, or success
5454 bool ScriptGetGoalAnimations( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
5455 {
5456  uint32 goalId;
5457  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5458 
5459  const char* type = NULL;
5460  pParams->GetString( CRCD(0x7321a8d6,"type"), &type, Script::NO_ASSERT );
5461 
5462  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5463  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5464 
5465  pGoalManager->GetGoalAnimations( goalId, type, pScript );
5466  return true;
5467 }
5468 
5469 /******************************************************************/
5470 /* */
5471 /* */
5472 /******************************************************************/
5473 
5474 // @script | GoalManager_PlayGoalStream | plays the appropriate stream for this
5475 // goal/pro. The appropriate anim arrays must be setup in script for this to work
5476 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5477 bool ScriptPlayGoalStream( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
5478 {
5479  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5480  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5481 
5482  pGoalManager->PlayGoalStream( pParams );
5483  return true;
5484 }

5490 
5491 // @script | GoalManager_EndRunCalled | returns true if the goal manager
5492 // called endrun for this goal
5493 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5494 bool ScriptEndRunCalled(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5495 {
5496  uint32 goalId;
5497  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5498 
5499  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5500  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5501 
5502  return pGoalManager->EndRunCalled( goalId );
5503 }
5504 
5505 /******************************************************************/
5506 /* */
5507 /* */
5508 /******************************************************************/
5509 
5510 // @script | GoalManager_ClearEndRun | This will clear the skater's endrun exception
5511 // as well as any others. It's used by the combo goal, which needs to clear
5512 // the exception if you bail. In general, this function should not be used -
5513 // clearing the endrun exception is not usually a good idea.
5514 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5515 bool ScriptClearEndRun(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5516 {
5517  uint32 goalId;
5518  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5519 
5520  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5521  pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId )->ClearEndRun( pScript );
5522 
5523  return true;
5524 }
5525 
5526

5528 /* */
5529 /* */
5530 /******************************************************************/
5531 
5532 // @script | GoalManager_FinishedEndOfRun | returns true if EndOfRun has
5533 // finished
5534 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5535 bool ScriptFinishedEndOfRun(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5536 {
5537  uint32 goalId;
5538  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5539 
5540  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5541  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5542 
5543  return pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId )->FinishedEndOfRun();
5544 }
5545 
5546 /******************************************************************/
5547 /* */
5548 /* */
5549 /******************************************************************/
5550 
5551 // @script | GoalManager_StartedEndOfRun | this returns true if EndOfRun
5552 // has started
5553 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5554 bool ScriptStartedEndOfRun(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5555 {
5556  uint32 goalId;
5557  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5558 
5559  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5560  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5561 
5562  return pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId )->StartedEndOfRun();
5563 }
5564 
5565 /******************************************************************/
5566 /* */
5567 /* */
5568 /******************************************************************/
5569 
5570 // @script | GoalManager_EndBetAttempt | call this to end a bet attempt.
5571 // If the goal id does not match the current bet, the call will be ignored.
5572 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5573 bool ScriptEndBetAttempt(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5574 {
5575  uint32 goalId;
5576  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5577 
5578  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5579  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5580 
5581  uint32 id = pGoalManager->GetBettingGuyId();
5582  if ( id )
5583  {
5584  CBettingGuy* pGoal = (CBettingGuy*)pGoalManager->GetGoal( id );
5585  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
5586  return pGoal->EndBetAttempt( goalId );
5587  }
5588  return false;
5589 }
5590 
5591 
5592 /******************************************************************/
5593 /* */
5594 /* */
5595 /******************************************************************/
5596 
5597 // @script | GoalManager_StartBetAttempt | called by any minigame that is
5598 // also used as a betting game
5599 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5600 bool ScriptStartBetAttempt(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5601 {
5602  uint32 goalId;
5603  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5604 
5605  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5606  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5607 
5608  uint32 id = pGoalManager->GetBettingGuyId();
5609  if ( id )
5610  {
5611  CBettingGuy* pGoal = (CBettingGuy*)pGoalManager->GetGoal( id );
5612  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
5613  return pGoal->StartBetAttempt( goalId );
5614  }
5615  return false;
5616 }
5617 
5618 /******************************************************************/
5619 /* */
5620 /* */
5621 /******************************************************************/
5622 
5623 // @script | GoalManager_WinBet | calling this will win the bet.
5624 // The goal id is used to verify that the specified bet is in fact
5625 // the active bet. If it's not, the goal manager will ignore the call
5626 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5627 bool ScriptWinBet(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5628 {
5629  uint32 goalId;
5630  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5631 
5632  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5633  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5634 
5635  uint32 id = pGoalManager->GetBettingGuyId();
5636  if ( id )
5637  {
5638  CBettingGuy* pGoal = (CBettingGuy*)pGoalManager->GetGoal( id );
5639  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
5640  pGoal->Win( goalId );
5641  }
5642  return true;
5643 }
5644 
5645 
5646 /******************************************************************/
5647 /* */
5648 /* */
5649 /******************************************************************/
5650 
5651 // @script | GoalManager_BetOffered | called once the betting guy makes
5652 // an offer
5653 bool ScriptBetOffered( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
5654 {
5655  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5656  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5657 
5658  uint32 id = pGoalManager->GetBettingGuyId();
5659  if ( id )
5660  {
5661  CBettingGuy* pGoal = (CBettingGuy*)pGoalManager->GetGoal( id );
5662  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
5663  pGoal->OfferMade();
5664  }
5665  return true;
5666 }
5667 
5668 /******************************************************************/
5669 /* */
5670 /* */
5671 /******************************************************************/
5672 
5673 // @script | GoalManager_BetRefused | called when the player declines a betting
5674 // guy bet
5675 bool ScriptBetRefused( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
5676 {
5677  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5678  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5679 
5680  uint32 id = pGoalManager->GetBettingGuyId();
5681  if ( id )
5682  {
5683  CBettingGuy* pGoal = (CBettingGuy*)pGoalManager->GetGoal( id );
5684  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
5685  pGoal->OfferRefused();
5686  }
5687  return true;
5688 }
5689 
5690 /******************************************************************/
5691 /* */
5692 /* */
5693 /******************************************************************/
5694 
5695 // @script | GoalManager_MoveBettingGuyNow | this will force the betting guy to
5696 // immediately move to a new, random betting game. This is useful when the betting guy
5697 // is created and you don't care where the skater is (otherwise the betting guy will avoid
5698 // moving where the skater could see him).
5699 bool ScriptMoveBettingGuyNow( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
5700 {
5701  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5702  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5703 
5704  uint32 id = pGoalManager->GetBettingGuyId();
5705  if ( id )
5706  {
5707  CBettingGuy* pGoal = (CBettingGuy*)pGoalManager->GetGoal( id );
5708  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
5709  pGoal->MoveToNewNode( true );
5710  }
5711  return true;
5712 }
5713 
5714 /******************************************************************/
5715 /* */
5716 /* */
5717 /******************************************************************/
5718 
5719 // @script | GoalManager_BetAccepted | called when the player accepts a bet
5720 bool ScriptBetAccepted(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5721 {
5722  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5723  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5724 
5725  uint32 id = pGoalManager->GetBettingGuyId();
5726  if ( id )
5727  {
5728  CBettingGuy* pGoal = (CBettingGuy*)pGoalManager->GetGoal( id );
5729  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
5730  pGoal->OfferAccepted();
5731  }
5732  return true;
5733 }
5734 
5735 /******************************************************************/
5736 /* */
5737 /* */
5738 /******************************************************************/
5739 
5740 // @script | GoalManager_BetIsActive | returns true if the bet is currently
5741 // active - ie, the bet guy has offered the bet and the player accepted
5742 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5743 bool ScriptBetIsActive(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5744 {
5745  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5746  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5747 
5748  uint32 goalId;
5749  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5750 
5751  uint32 betting_guy_id = pGoalManager->GetBettingGuyId();
5752  if ( betting_guy_id )
5753  {
5754  CBettingGuy* pBetGuy = (CBettingGuy*)pGoalManager->GetGoal( betting_guy_id );
5755  Dbg_Assert( pBetGuy );
5756  return pBetGuy->BetIsActive( goalId );
5757  }
5758  return false;
5759 }
5760 
5761 /******************************************************************/
5762 /* */
5763 /* */
5764 /******************************************************************/
5765 
5766 // @script | GoalManager_AddMinigameTime | adds the specified amount of time
5767 // to the minigame.
5768 // @parm name | name | the minigame id (usually goal_id)
5769 // @uparm 1 | the amount of time to add in seconds
5770 bool ScriptAddMinigameTime(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5771 {
5772  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5773  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5774 
5775  uint32 goalId;
5776  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5777 
5778  int amount;
5779  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &amount, Script::ASSERT );
5780 
5781  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId );
5782  Dbg_MsgAssert( pGoal->IsMinigame(), ("This is not a minigame") );
5783  CMinigame* pMinigame = (CMinigame*)pGoal;
5784  return pMinigame->AddTime( amount );
5785 }
5786 
5787 /******************************************************************/
5788 /* */
5789 /* */
5790 /******************************************************************/
5791 
5792 // @script | GoalManager_AddTempSpecialTrick | This is used only by the
5793 // special goal.
5794 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5795 bool ScriptAddTempSpecialTrick(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5796 {
5797  uint32 goalId;
5798  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5799 
5800  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5801  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5802 
5803  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId );
5804  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
5805 
5806  return pGoal->AddTempSpecialTrick();
5807 }
5808 
5809 /******************************************************************/
5810 /* */
5811 /* */
5812 /******************************************************************/
5813 
5814 // @script | GoalManager_RemoveTempSpecialTrick | this is used only by the
5815 // special goal.
5816 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5817 bool ScriptRemoveTempSpecialTrick(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5818 {
5819  uint32 goalId;
5820  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5821 
5822  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5823  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5824 
5825  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId );
5826  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
5827 
5828  pGoal->RemoveTempSpecialTrick();
5829  return true;
5830 }
5831 
5832 
5833 /******************************************************************/
5834 /* */
5835 /* */
5836 /******************************************************************/
5837 
5838 // @script | GoalManager_GetTrickFromKeyCombo | this will find the trick
5839 // currently bound to the given key combo. the trick name (checksum value) will
5840 // be placed in the script params as trick_checksum. The trick text
5841 // will be placed in the params as trick_string. If no trick is bound to the
5842 // key combo, the function will return false
5843 // @parm name | key_combo | the key combo to search for
5844 bool ScriptGetTrickFromKeyCombo(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5845 {
5846  uint32 key_combo;
5847  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xacfdb27a,"key_combo"), &key_combo, Script::ASSERT );
5848 
5849  Mdl::Skate * pSkate = Mdl::Skate::Instance();
5850  Obj::CSkaterProfile* pSkaterProfile = pSkate->GetCurrentProfile();
5851  Script::CStruct* pTricks = pSkaterProfile->GetTrickMapping( CRCD(0xd544aa2d,"trick_mapping") );
5852 
5853  uint32 trick_checksum;
5854  int cat_num;
5855  if ( !pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xb394c01c,"special") ) )
5856  {
5857  if( pTricks->GetInteger( key_combo, &cat_num, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
5858  {
5859  // printf("it's a created trick! %i\n", cat_num );
5860  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0xa75b8581,"cat_num"), cat_num );
5861  return true;
5862  }
5863 
5864  if( pTricks->GetChecksum( key_combo, &trick_checksum, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
5865  {
5866  if ( trick_checksum == ( CRCD(0xf60c9090,"Unassigned") ) )
5867  return false;
5868 
5869  // return the name and checksum
5870  const char* p_trick_string;
5871  Script::CStruct* p_trick = Script::GetStructure( trick_checksum, Script::ASSERT );
5872  Script::CStruct* p_trick_params;
5873  p_trick->GetStructure( CRCD(0x7031f10c,"Params"), &p_trick_params, Script::ASSERT );
5874  p_trick_params->GetLocalString( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"Name"), &p_trick_string, Script::ASSERT );
5875 
5876  pScript->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0x3a54cc4b,"trick_string"), p_trick_string );
5877  pScript->GetParams()->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x4443a4da,"trick_checksum"), trick_checksum );
5878 
5879  // look for any double tap tricks
5880  uint32 extra_trick = 0;
5881  if ( !p_trick_params->GetChecksum( CRCD(0x6e855102,"ExtraTricks"), &extra_trick, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
5882  {
5883  // look for an array of extra tricks and grab the first one
5884  Script::CArray* p_extra_tricks;
5885  if ( p_trick_params->GetArray( CRCD(0x6e855102,"ExtraTricks"), &p_extra_tricks, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
5886  extra_trick = p_extra_tricks->GetChecksum( 0 );
5887  }
5888 
5889  // add any extra trick info
5890  if ( extra_trick )
5891  {
5892  // grab this extra trick
5893  Script::CArray* p_temp = Script::GetArray( extra_trick, Script::ASSERT );
5894  Script::CStruct* p_extra_trick = p_temp->GetStructure( 0 );
5895  Dbg_Assert( p_extra_trick );
5896  Script::CStruct* p_extra_trick_params;
5897  p_extra_trick->GetStructure( CRCD(0x7031f10c,"Params"), &p_extra_trick_params, Script::ASSERT );
5898  const char* p_extra_trick_string;
5899  p_extra_trick_params->GetString( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"Name"), &p_extra_trick_string, Script::ASSERT );
5900  pScript->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0x3daaf58b,"extra_trick_string"), p_extra_trick_string );
5901  pScript->GetParams()->AddChecksum( CRCD(0xd0bcfc62,"extra_trick_checksum"), extra_trick );
5902  }
5903  return true;
5904  }
5905  }
5906  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xb394c01c,"special") ) )
5907  {
5908  // check the special tricks
5909  int numTricks = pSkaterProfile->GetNumSpecialTrickSlots();
5910 
5911  // search through current special tricks
5912  for ( int i = 0; i < numTricks; i++ )
5913  {
5914  Obj::SSpecialTrickInfo trick_info = pSkaterProfile->GetSpecialTrickInfo( i );
5915 
5916  if ( trick_info.m_TrickSlot == key_combo )
5917  {
5918  if ( trick_info.m_TrickName == ( CRCD(0xf60c9090,"Unassigned") ) )
5919  return false;
5920 
5921  // printf("the special trick is already bound!\n");
5922  if ( Script::CStruct* p_trick = Script::GetStructure( trick_info.m_TrickName ) )
5923  {
5924  const char* p_trick_string;
5925  Script::CStruct* p_trick_params;
5926  p_trick->GetStructure( CRCD(0x7031f10c,"Params"), &p_trick_params, Script::ASSERT );
5927  p_trick_params->GetLocalString( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"Name"), &p_trick_string, Script::ASSERT );
5928  pScript->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0x3a54cc4b,"trick_string"), p_trick_string );
5929  }
5930 
5931  if ( trick_info.m_isCat )
5932  {
5933  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0x4443a4da,"trick_checksum"), trick_info.m_TrickName );
5934  }
5935  else
5936  {
5937  pScript->GetParams()->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x4443a4da,"trick_checksum"), trick_info.m_TrickName );
5938  }
5939  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0xdb92effa,"current_index"), i );
5940  return true;
5941  }
5942  }
5943  }
5944  return false;
5945 }
5946 
5947 /******************************************************************/
5948 /* */
5949 /* */
5950 /******************************************************************/
5951 
5952 // @script | GoalManager_UnlockGoal | unlocks the specified goal
5953 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5954 bool ScriptUnlockGoal(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5955 {
5956  uint32 goalId;
5957  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5958 
5959  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5960  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId );
5961 
5962  pGoal->UnlockGoal();
5963  return true;
5964 }
5965 
5966 /******************************************************************/
5967 /* */
5968 /* */
5969 /******************************************************************/
5970 
5971 // @script | GoalManager_QuickStartGoal | starts a goal without going
5972 // through the intro movie, etc.
5973 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5974 // @flag dontAssert | used by autotester
5975 bool ScriptQuickStartGoal(Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript)
5976 {
5977  uint32 goalId;
5978  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
5979 
5980  bool dontAssert = false;
5981  if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x9ac8d54f,"dontAssert") ) )
5982  dontAssert = true;
5983 
5984  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
5985  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
5986 
5987  return pGoalManager->QuickStartGoal( goalId, dontAssert );
5988 }
5989 
5990 /******************************************************************/
5991 /* */
5992 /* */
5993 /******************************************************************/
5994 
5995 // @script | GoalManager_InitializeGoal | initialize the specified goal
5996 // @parm name | name | the goal id
5997 bool ScriptInitializeGoal( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
5998 {
5999  uint32 goalId;
6000  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
6001 
6002  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6003  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6004 
6005  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId );
6006  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
6007 
6008  pGoal->Init();
6009  return true;
6010 }
6011 // TODO: it would be nice to have the cfuncs call the goalmanager's
6012 // member functions directly...
6013 
6014 /******************************************************************/
6015 /* */
6016 /* */
6017 /******************************************************************/
6018 
6019 // @script | GoalManager_AddTime | adds the specified amount of time to the goal
6020 // @parm name | name | the goal id
6021 // @uparm 10 | time to add, in seconds
6022 bool ScriptAddTime( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6023 {
6024  uint32 goalId;
6025  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
6026 
6027  int time;
6028  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &time, Script::ASSERT );
6029 
6030  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6031  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6032 
6033  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId );
6034  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
6035 
6036  pGoal->AddTime( time );
6037  return true;
6038 }
6039 
6040 /******************************************************************/
6041 /* */
6042 /* */
6043 /******************************************************************/
6044 
6045 // @script | GoalManager_ReplaceTrickText | replaces the trick name and
6046 // key combo with the appropriate text. The key combo should be represented
6047 // in the string by \k, and the text by \t
6048 // @parmopt name | name | | the goal id
6049 // @flag all | in place of a goal id - update all goals
6050 bool ScriptReplaceTrickText( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6051 {
6052  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6053  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6054 
6055  uint32 goalId;
6056  if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xc4e78e22,"all") ) )
6057  {
6058  pGoalManager->ReplaceAllTrickText();
6059  return true;
6060  }
6061  else if ( pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
6062  {
6063  const char* p_old_string;
6064  if ( pParams->GetString( CRCD(0xc4745838,"text"), &p_old_string, Script::NO_ASSERT ) )
6065  {
6066  char new_string[NEW_STRING_LENGTH];
6067  if ( pGoalManager->ReplaceTrickText( goalId, p_old_string, new_string, NEW_STRING_LENGTH ) )
6068  {
6069  pScript->GetParams()->RemoveComponent( CRCD(0x3eafa520,"TrickText") );
6070  pScript->GetParams()->AddString( CRCD(0x3eafa520,"TrickText"), new_string );
6071  }
6072  }
6073  else
6074  return pGoalManager->ReplaceTrickText( goalId );
6075  }
6076  else
6077  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "GoalManager_ReplaceTrickText requires a goal id or the 'all' flag." ) );
6078  return true;
6079 }
6080 
6081 /******************************************************************/
6082 /* */
6083 /* */
6084 /******************************************************************/

6094  return true;
6095 }

6115 /* */
6116 /******************************************************************/
6117 
6118 // @script | GoalManager_GetNumberCollected | returns the number of objects
6119 // collected so far in this goal. If the goal is not a counter goal, it just returns
6120 // the number of flags set. The value will be stored in the number_collected var.
6121 // @parm name | name | the goal id
6122 bool ScriptGetNumberCollected( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6123 {
6124  uint32 goalId;
6125  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
6126 
6127  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6128  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6129 
6130  int number_collected = pGoalManager->GetNumberCollected( goalId );
6131  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0x129daa10,"number_collected"), number_collected );
6132  return true;
6133 }

6136 /******************************************************************/
6137 /* */
6138 /* */
6139 /******************************************************************/
6140 
6141 // @script | GoalManager_GetNumberOfFlags | returns the number of flags in this
6142 // goal. If there are no flags, it returns false
6143 // @parm name | name | the goal id
6144 bool ScriptGetNumberOfFlags( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6145 {
6146  uint32 goalId;
6147  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
6148 
6149  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6150  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6151 
6152  int number_of_flags = pGoalManager->GetNumberOfFlags( goalId );
6153  if ( number_of_flags != -1 )
6154  {
6155  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0xcb9d1224,"number_of_flags"), number_of_flags );
6156  return true;
6157  }
6158  return false;
6159 }

6201 // @script | GoalManager_ColorTrickObjects | colors all trick objects
6202 // associated with this goal
6203 // @parm name | name | the goal id
6204 // @flag clear | pass this in if you want to clear the color
6205 // @parmopt int | skater | 0 | the skater num
6206 bool ScriptColorTrickObjects( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6207 {
6208  uint32 goalId;
6209  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
6210 
6211  bool clear = pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x1a4e0ef9,"clear") );
6212 
6213  int skaterId = 0;
6214  pParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0x5b8ab877,"skater"), &skaterId, Script::NO_ASSERT );
6215 
6216  int seqIndex = skaterId + 1;
6217 
6218  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6219  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6220 
6221  pGoalManager->ColorTrickObjects( goalId, seqIndex, clear );
6222  return true;
6223 }

6232 // the calling scripts params as times_lost

6304 
6305 // @script | GoalManager_GetLastGoalId | returns the last unbeaten goal
6306 // as a checksum param goal_id. If the player hasn't played a goal yet
6307 // or beat the last goal, the function will return false.
6308 bool ScriptGetLastGoalId( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6309 {
6310  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6311  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6312 
6313  uint32 goalId = pGoalManager->GetLastGoalId();
6314  if ( goalId )
6315  {
6316  pScript->GetParams()->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x9982e501,"goal_id"), goalId );
6317  return true;
6318  }
6319  return false;
6320 }

6339 
6340  CSkatetrisGoal* pSkatetrisGoal = (CSkatetrisGoal*)pGoal;
6341  pSkatetrisGoal->ClearAllTricks();
6342  return true;

6383 /******************************************************************/
6384 /* */
6385 /* */
6386 /******************************************************************/
6387 
6388 bool ScriptAnnounceGoalStarted( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6389 {
6390  GameNet::Manager * gamenet_man = GameNet::Manager::Instance();
6391  Net::Client* client;
6392  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6393  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6394 
6395  uint32 goalId;
6396  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
6397 
6398  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId );
6399  Dbg_Assert( pGoal != NULL );
6400 
6401  if( pGoal->IsNetGoal())
6402  {
6403  return true;
6404  }
6405  if( pGoal->GetParents()->m_relative != 0 )
6406  {
6407  return true;
6408  }
6409 
6410  client = gamenet_man->GetClient( 0 );
6411  Dbg_Assert( client );
6412  GameNet::MsgStartedGoal msg;
6413  GameNet::PlayerInfo* local_player;
6414  Net::MsgDesc msg_desc;
6415 
6416  local_player = gamenet_man->GetLocalPlayer();
6417  Dbg_Assert( local_player );
6418 
6419  msg.m_GameId = gamenet_man->GetNetworkGameId();
6420  msg.m_GoalId = pGoal->GetGoalId();
6421 
6422  msg_desc.m_Data = &msg;
6423  msg_desc.m_Length = sizeof( GameNet::MsgStartedGoal );
6424  msg_desc.m_Id = GameNet::MSG_ID_STARTED_GOAL;
6425  client->EnqueueMessageToServer( &msg_desc );
6426 
6427  return true;
6428 }
6429 
6430 /******************************************************************/
6431 /* */
6432 /* */
6433 /******************************************************************/
6434 
6435 // @script | GoalManager_SetEndRunType | one of the flags is required
6436 // @parm name | name | the goal id
6437 // @flag Goal_EndOfRun | use GoalEndOfRun
6438 // @flag EndOfRun | use EndOfRun
6439 // @flag none | don't use end of run
6440 bool ScriptSetEndRunType( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6441 {
6442  uint32 goalId;
6443  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
6444 
6445  Game::EndRunType newEndRunType = Game::vENDOFRUN;
6446  if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x54585419,"Goal_EndOfRun") ) )
6447  newEndRunType = Game::vGOALENDOFRUN;
6448  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0xe022c12c,"EndOfRun") ) )
6449  newEndRunType = Game::vENDOFRUN;
6450  else if ( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x806fff30,"none") ) )
6451  newEndRunType = Game::vNONE;
6452  else
6453  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "GoalManager_SetEndRunType called without type" ) );
6454 
6455  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6456  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6457 
6458  pGoalManager->SetEndRunType( goalId, newEndRunType );
6459  return true;
6460 }
6461 
6462 /******************************************************************/
6463 /* */
6464 /* */
6465 /******************************************************************/
6466 
6467 // @script | GoalManager_SetShouldDeactivateOnExpire |
6468 // @uparm 1 | 0 for no, anything else for yes
6469 bool ScriptSetShouldDeactivateOnExpire( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6470 {
6471  uint32 goalId;
6472  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
6473 
6474  int should_deactivate;
6475  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &should_deactivate, Script::ASSERT );
6476 
6477  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6478  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6479 
6480  pGoalManager->SetShouldDeactivateOnExpire( goalId, should_deactivate != 0 );
6481  return true;
6482 }

6484 
6485 /******************************************************************/
6486 /* */
6487 /* */
6488 /******************************************************************/
6489 
6490 // @script | GoalManager_GetActiveGoalId | returns the active goal's goal_id.
6491 // Returns false if there are no active goals
6492 bool ScriptGetActiveGoalId( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6493 {
6494  uint32 goalId = 0;
6495  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6496  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6497 
6498  if ( pGoalManager )
6499  {
6500  int activeGoal = pGoalManager->GetActiveGoal( true );
6501  if ( activeGoal == -1 )
6502  return false;
6503 
6504  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->GetGoalByIndex( activeGoal );
6505  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
6506  if ( pGoal )
6507  {
6508  goalId = pGoal->GetGoalId();
6509  pScript->GetParams()->AddChecksum( "goal_id", goalId );
6510  return true;
6511  }
6512  }
6513  return false;
6514 }
6515

6517 /* */
6518 /* */
6519 /******************************************************************/
6520 
6521 // @script | GoalManager_AwardMinigameCash |
6522 // @parm name | name | the goal id
6523 // @uparm 25 | amount of cash to award
6524 bool ScriptAwardMinigameCash( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6525 {
6526  uint32 goalId;
6527  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0xa1dc81f9,"name"), &goalId, Script::ASSERT );
6528 
6529  int amount;
6530  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &amount, Script::ASSERT );
6531 
6532  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6533  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6534 
6535  if ( pGoalManager )
6536  {
6537  return pGoalManager->AwardMinigameCash( goalId, amount );
6538  }
6539  return false;
6540 }

6628  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );

6632

6634  return true;
