6654 /******************************************************************/
6655 /* */
6656 /* */
6657 /******************************************************************/
6658 
6659 // @script | GoalManager_SetDifficultyLevel | sets the current level
6660 // @uparm 1 | difficulty level (starts at 0)
6661 bool ScriptSetDifficultyLevel( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6662 {
6663  int level;
6664  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &level, Script::ASSERT );
6665  Dbg_MsgAssert( level >= 0 && level <= vMAXDIFFICULTYLEVEL, ( "GoalManager_SetDifficultyLevel called with level of %i", level ) );
6666 
6667  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6668  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6669  pGoalManager->SetDifficultyLevel( level );
6670  return ( level != 0 );
6671 }
6672 
6673 /******************************************************************/
6674 /* */
6675 /* */
6676 /******************************************************************/
6677 
6678 // @script | GoalManager_GetDifficultyLevel | returns the current
6679 // difficulty level as an integer param called difficulty_level
6680 bool ScriptGetDifficultyLevel( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6681 {
6682  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6683  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6684  int level = (int)pGoalManager->GetDifficultyLevel();
6685  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0x3671f748,"difficulty_level"), level );
6686  return true;
6687 }
6688

6690 /* */

6693 /*

6706

6708  switch ( type_checksum )
6709  {
6710  case CRCC(0x21902065,"checksum"):
6711  type=ESYMBOLTYPE_NAME;
6712  break;
6713  case CRCC(0x365aa16a,"float"):
6714  type=ESYMBOLTYPE_FLOAT;
6715  break;
6716  case CRCC(0xa5f054f4,"integer"):
6717  type=ESYMBOLTYPE_INTEGER;
6718  break;

6720  type=ESYMBOLTYPE_STRUCTURE;
6721  break;

6723  type=ESYMBOLTYPE_ARRAY;
6724  break;

6726  Dbg_MsgAssert( 0, ( "Uknown type %x", type ) );
6727  break;
6728  }

6731  pParams->GetChecksum( NONAME, &name, Script::ASSERT );
6732 
6733  // printf("looking for %s with type %s\n", Script::FindChecksumName( name ), Script::FindChecksumName( type ) );
6734 
6735  return pGoal->ExtractDifficultyLevelParam( type, name, pScript->GetParams() );
6736 }

6743 // @script | GoalManager_RestartStage | restarts the current/last stage
6744 bool ScriptRestartStage( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6745 {

6747  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6748  pGoalManager->RestartStage();
6749 
6750  return true;
6751 }

6781 /******************************************************************/
6782 /* */
6783 /* */
6784 /******************************************************************/
6785 
6786 // @script | GoalManager_AdvanceStage | returns true if the stage/chapter
6787 // advances, false if you haven't reached an advancement point yet.
6788 // @flag force | force the stage to advance
6789 // @flag just_won_goal | this flag needs to be passed in if the function is called
6790 // from a success script, as the goal is not marked beaten until after the success
6791 // script finishes. Therefore, the total number of goals beaten will be one more
6792 // than the number returned by searching through the goals.
6793 bool ScriptAdvanceStage( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6794 {
6795  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6796  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6797  uint32 just_won_goal_id = 0;
6798  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0x5d82c486,"just_won_goal_id"), &just_won_goal_id, Script::NO_ASSERT );
6799  return pGoalManager->AdvanceStage( pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD( 0x68977cd7, "force" ) ), just_won_goal_id );
6800 }
6801 
6802 /******************************************************************/
6803 /* */
6804 /* */
6805 /******************************************************************/
6806 
6807 // @script | GoalManager_GetCurrentChapterAndStage | returns the
6808 // current chapter and stage as currentChapter and currentStage
6809 bool ScriptGetCurrentChapterAndStage( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6810 {
6811  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6812  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6813  int chapter = pGoalManager->GetCurrentChapter();
6814  int stage = pGoalManager->GetCurrentStage();
6815 
6816  // return the last chapter if they beat the game
6817  Script::CArray* pChapterGoalsArray = Script::GetArray( CRCD( 0xb892776f, "chapter_goals" ), Script::ASSERT );
6818  Dbg_Assert( pChapterGoalsArray->GetType() == ESYMBOLTYPE_ARRAY );
6819  if ( chapter >= (int)pChapterGoalsArray->GetSize() )
6820  {
6821  chapter = pChapterGoalsArray->GetSize() - 1;
6822  }
6823  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD( 0xf884773c, "CurrentChapter" ), chapter );
6824  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD( 0xaf1575eb, "CurrentStage" ), stage );
6825  return true;
6826 }
6827 
6828 /******************************************************************/
6829 /* */
6830 /* */
6831 /******************************************************************/
6832 
6833 // @script | GoalManager_SetCurrentChapterAndStage |
6834 // @parmopt int | chapter | current |
6835 // @parmopt int | stage | current |
6836 bool ScriptSetCurrentChapterAndStage( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6837 {
6838  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6839  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6840  int chapter = pGoalManager->GetCurrentChapter();
6841  int stage = pGoalManager->GetCurrentStage();
6842  pParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0x67e4ad1,"chapter"), &chapter, Script::NO_ASSERT );
6843  pParams->GetInteger( CRCD(0x3d836c96,"stage"), &stage, Script::NO_ASSERT );
6844  pGoalManager->SetCurrentChapter( chapter );
6845  pGoalManager->SetCurrentStage( stage );
6846  return true;
6847 }
6848 
6849 /******************************************************************/
6850 /* */
6851 /* */
6852 /******************************************************************/
6853 // @script | GoalManager_FilmGoalCheckpoint | Call this when the filming
6854 // target reaches a checkpoint. This is only used for filming goals that
6855 // require the skater to catch X of Y checkpoints, not goals which requrie
6856 // the skater to film the target for X of Y seconds.
6857 // @parm name | name | the goal_id
6858 bool ScriptFilmGoalCheckpoint( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6859 {
6860  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6861  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6862  CFilmGoal* pFilmGoal = (CFilmGoal*)pGoalManager->GetGoal( pParams, true );
6863 
6864  pFilmGoal->CheckpointHit();
6865  return true;
6866 }
6867 
6868 /******************************************************************/
6869 /* */
6870 /* */
6871 /******************************************************************/
6872 // @script | GoalManager_StartFilming | Called when the start cam anims finish.
6873 // @parm name | name | the goal_id
6874 bool ScriptStartFilming( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6875 {
6876  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6877  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6878  CFilmGoal* pFilmGoal = (CFilmGoal*)pGoalManager->GetGoal( pParams, true );
6879 
6880  pFilmGoal->StartFilming();
6881  return true;
6882 }
6883 
6884 
6885 /******************************************************************/
6886 /* */
6887 /* */
6888 /******************************************************************/
6889 // @script | GoalManager_GoalShouldExpire | setup for endrun exceptions
6890 bool ScriptGoalShouldExpire( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6891 {
6892  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6893  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6894  if ( pGoalManager )
6895  {
6896  int activeGoal = pGoalManager->GetActiveGoal();
6897  if ( activeGoal == -1 )
6898  return false;
6899 
6900  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->GetGoalByIndex( activeGoal );
6901  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
6902  if ( pGoal )
6903  {
6904  return pGoal->ShouldExpire();
6905  }
6906  }
6907  return false;
6908 }
6909

6912 /* */

6917 // @uparm sponsor_name | the checksum of the sponsor name
6918 bool ScriptSetSponsor( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6919 {
6920  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6921  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6922 
6923  uint32 sponsor;
6924  pParams->GetChecksum( NONAME, &sponsor, Script::ASSERT );
6925  pGoalManager->SetSponsor( sponsor );
6926  return true;
6927 }

6934 // @script | GoalManager_GetSponsor | returns sponsor as param "sponsor"
6935 // the sponsor will be 0 if not set
6936 bool ScriptGetSponsor( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6937 {
6938  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6939  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6940 
6941  pScript->GetParams()->AddChecksum( CRCD(0x7e73362b,"sponsor"), pGoalManager->GetSponsor() );
6942  return true;
6943 }
6944 
6945 /******************************************************************/
6946 /* */
6947 /* */
6948 /******************************************************************/
6949 
6950 // @script | GoalManager_GetTeam | returns team structure as param named
6951 // team. It also returns the current number of team members, in a param
6952 // named num_team_members
6953 bool ScriptGetTeam( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6954 {
6955  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6956  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6957  Script::CStruct* pTeam = pGoalManager->GetTeam();
6958  pScript->GetParams()->AddStructure( CRCD(0x3b1f59e0,"team"), pTeam );
6959 
6960  // throw in the number of team members
6961  Script::CComponent* p_comp = NULL;
6962  p_comp = pTeam->GetNextComponent( p_comp );
6963 
6964  int total = 0;
6965  while ( p_comp )
6966  {
6967  Script::CComponent* p_next = pTeam->GetNextComponent( p_comp );
6968  total++;
6969  p_comp = p_next;
6970  }
6971  pScript->GetParams()->AddInteger( CRCD(0xeb8dd330,"num_team_members"), total );
6972 
6973  return true;
6974 }
6975 
6976 
6977 /******************************************************************/
6978 /* */
6979 /* */
6980 /******************************************************************/
6981 
6982 // @script | GoalManager_SetTeamMember | add or remove a team member
6983 // @parm name | pro | name of the pro to add or remove
6984 // @flag remove | use this flag to remove the pro - will add by default
6985 bool ScriptSetTeamMember( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
6986 {
6987  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
6988  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
6989  uint32 pro;
6990  pParams->GetChecksum( CRCD(0x944b2900,"pro"), &pro, Script::ASSERT );
6991  bool remove = pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x977fe2cf,"remove") );
6992  bool mark_used = pParams->ContainsFlag( CRCD(0x531ff702,"mark_used") );
6993  Dbg_MsgAssert( !( remove && mark_used ), ( "GoalManager_SetTeamMember called with remove and mark_used flags." ) );
6994  pGoalManager->SetTeamMember( pro, remove, mark_used );
6995  return true;
6996 }
6997

6999 /* */
7000 /* */
7001 /******************************************************************/

7005 {
7006  CGoalManager* pGoalManager = GetGoalManager();
7007  Dbg_Assert( pGoalManager );
7008  pGoalManager->KillTeamMembers( );
7009  return true;
7010 }

7051 bool ScriptGoalInitialized( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )
7052 {

7058

7061

7063 }

7071 // loaded for the goal ped. If the fam has already been unloaded, it
7072 // will return
7073 bool ScriptUnloadLastFam( Script::CStruct* pParams, Script::CScript* pScript )

7081  CGoal* pGoal = pGoalManager->GetGoal( goalId );
7082  Dbg_Assert( pGoal );
7083 
7084  pGoal->mp_goalPed->UnloadLastFam();
7085  return true;
7086 }

7121  int hide;
7122  pParams->GetInteger( NONAME, &hide, Script::ASSERT );
7123  pGoalManager->HideAllGoalPeds( ( hide != 0 ) );
7124  return true;
